MetaDataPointU32.Name: canDeviceType
MetaDataPointU32.Description: The object at index 1000h describes the type of device and its functionality. It is composed of a 16-bit field which describes the device profile that is used and a second 16-bit field which gives additional information about optional functionality of the device. The Additional Information parameter is device profile specific.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: canErrorRegister
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This object is an error register for the device. The device can map internal errors in this byte. This entry is mandatory for all devices. It is a part of an Emergency object.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parApErrorGenericError
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Error Code (Category - Code)

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSync
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Index 1005h defines the COB-ID of the Synchronisation Object (SYNC). Further, it defines whether the device generates the SYNC.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canCommunicationCyclePeriod
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object defines the communication cycle period in s. This period defines the SYNC interval. It is 0 if not used. If the communication cycle period on sync producer is changed to a new value unequal 0 the transmission of sync object resumes within 1 sync cycle of the new value.

MetaDataPointVisibleString.Name: canManufacturerDeviceVersion
MetaDataPointVisibleString.Description: Contains the manufacturer hardware version description.

MetaDataPointVisibleString.Name: canManufacturerSoftwareVersion
MetaDataPointVisibleString.Description: Contains the manufacturer software version description

MetaDataPointU16.Name: canGuardTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The objects at index 100Ch and 100Dh include the guard time in milliseconds and the life time factor. The life time factor multiplied with the guard time gives the life time for the Life Guarding Protocol. It is 0 if not used.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: canLifeTimeFactor
MetaDataPointU8.Description: The life time factor multiplied with the guard time gives the life time for the node guarding protocol. It is 0 if not used.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canStoreParameters
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object supports the saving of parameters in non volatile memory. By read access the device provides information about its saving capabilities. Several parameter groups are distinguished: Sub-Index 0 contains the largest Sub-Index that is supported. Sub-Index 1 refers to all parameters that can be stored on the device. Sub-Index 2 refers to communication related parameters (Index 1000h - 1FFFh manufacturer specific communication parameters). Sub-Index 3 refers to application related parameters (Index 6000h - 9FFFh manufacturer specific application parameters). At Sub-Index 4 - 127 manufacturers may store their choice of parameters individually. Sub-Index 128 - 254 are reserved for future use.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canRestoreDefaultParameters
MetaDataPointU32.Description: With this object the default values of parameters according to the communication or device profile are restored. By read access the device provides information about its capabilities to restore these values. Several parameter groups are distinguished: Sub-Index 0 contains the largest Sub-Index that is supported. Sub-Index 1 refers to all parameters that can be restored. Sub-Index 2 refers to communication related parameters (Index 1000h - 1FFFh manufacturer specific communication parameters). Sub-Index 3 refers to application related parameters (Index 6000h - 9FFFh manufacturer specific application parameters). At Sub-Index 4 - 127 manufacturers may restore their individual choice of parameters. Sub-Index 128 - 254 are reserved for future use.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canTimeStampMessage
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Index 1012h defines the COB-ID of the Time-Stamp Object (TIME). Further, it defines whether the device consumes the TIME or whether the device generates the TIME.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canHighResolutionTimeStamp
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object contains a time stamp with a resolution of 1 s. It can be mapped into a PDO in order to define a high resolution time stamp message. (Note that the data type of the standard time stamp message (TIME) is fixed). Further application specific use is encouraged.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canEmergencyMessage
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Index 1014h defines the COB-ID of the Emergency Object (EMCY).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: canInhibitTimeEmcy
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The inhibit time for the EMCY message can be adjusted via this entry. If this entry exists it must be writable in the object dictionary. The time has to be a multiple of 100 s.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: canProducerHeartbeatTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The producer hartbeat time defines the cycle time of the heartbeat. The producer heartbeat time is 0 if it not used. The time has to be a multiple of 1ms.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: Identity_Object
MetaDataPointU32.Description: The object at index 1018h contains general information about the device. The no of entries (sub-index 0h) is always 4. The Vendor ID (sub-index 1h) contains a unique value allocated to each manufacturer. The manufacturer-specific Product code (sub-index 2h) identifies a specific device version. The manufacturer-specific Revision number (sub-index 3h) consists of a major revision number and a minor revision number. The major revision number identifies a specific CANopen behaviour. If the CANopen functionality is expanded, the major revision has to be incremented. The minor revision number identifies different versions with the same CANopen behaviour. The serial number (sub index 04h) contains the serial number of the product in the BDR standard.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: canErrorBehaviour
MetaDataPointU8.Description: If a serious device failure is detected in Operational State, the module shall enter by default autonomously the pre-operational state. If object 1029h (Error Behaviour) is implemented, the device can be configured to enter alternatively the stopped state or remain in the current state in case of a device failure. Device failures shall include the following communication errors: Bus-off conditions of the CAN interface Life guarding event with the state occurred Heartbeat event with state occurred Severe device errors also can be caused by device internal failures.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canServerSdoParameter
MetaDataPointU32.Description: In order to describe the SDOs used on a device the data type SDO Parameter is introduced. The data type has the index 22h in the Object Dictionary. The structure is described in 9.5.4. The number of supported entries in the SDO object record is specified at sub-index 0h. The values at 1h and 2h specify the COB-ID for this SDO. Sub-index 3 gives the server of the SDO in case the record describes an SDO for which the device is client and gives the client of the SDO if the record describes an SDO for which the device is server.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canClientSdoParameter0
MetaDataPointU32.Description: These objects contain the parameters for the SDOs for which the device is the client. If the entry is supported, all sub-indices must be available. Starting at index 1280h and subsequent indices. The entries are described at the Server SDO Parameter.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canClientSdoParameter1
MetaDataPointU32.Description: These objects contain the parameters for the SDOs for which the device is the client. If the entry is supported, all sub-indices must be available. Starting at index 1280h and subsequent indices. The entries are described at the Server SDO Parameter.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canClientSdoParameter2
MetaDataPointU32.Description: These objects contain the parameters for the SDOs for which the device is the client. If the entry is supported, all sub-indices must be available. Starting at index 1280h and subsequent indices. The entries are described at the Server SDO Parameter.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canRequestSdo
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Request SDO

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canReleaseSdo
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Release SDO

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSdoManagerCobIds
MetaDataPointU32.Description: For establishing dynamic SDO connection the SDO Manager requires information about the COB-IDs that are free in the system. This can be configured in object 1F02.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSdoConnectionsPart1
MetaDataPointU32.Description: All actually running SDO connections

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSdoConnectionsPart2
MetaDataPointU32.Description: All actually running SDO connections

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSdoConnectionsPart3
MetaDataPointU32.Description: All actually running SDO connections

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSdoConnectionsPart4
MetaDataPointU32.Description: All actually running SDO connections

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canDynamicSdoConnectionState
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object is used for the SRD registration process as well as for the confirmation of an established SDO connection to a device S which the SRD has requested by the SDO Manager before.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: canSlaveFailed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This object dictionary entry is used to inform the SRD that the slave S caused a Error Control Error Event. The dynamic SDO connection is not longer valid. The Manager starts automatically to release the dynamic SDO connection. This object is optional on the SRD and is only supported if the Manager supports bit 3 in object 1F10h (Dynamic SDO Connection State).

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canNmtStartup
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object configures the start-up behaviour of a device that is able to perform the NMT.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSlaveAssignment
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object assigns slaves to the NMT Master. It gives information about Error Control Parameters and about actions to be performed on Error Control Events. All other parameters according to a slave in the Network List are only valid, if the slave is assigned to the SlaveAssignment 1F81h

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canVendorIdentification
MetaDataPointU32.Description: This object allows to enter values for expected Vendor IDs. Sub-Index 00h has the value of the highest node ID that was given out by the master. Each Sub-Index in the array corresponds to the slave with the Node ID equal to the SubIndex. The Sub-Index equal to the Master s Node-ID is ignored. If a value in this array is not 0, on boot-up procedure the Master will read object 1018h, Sub-Index 01h of the device and compare it to the actual value. The Boot-Up for that device is only continued on exact equality. The application may perform additional checks e.g. for serial numbers.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canProductCode
MetaDataPointU32.Description: 1F86h ProductCode: List of expected ProductCode (Object 1018h Sub-Index 02h) for each expected slave device. Sub-Index 00h has the value 127d. Each sub-index in the array correspond to the slave with the Node-ID equal to the sub-index. If a value in this array is not 0, on Boot-Up procedure the Master will read object 1018h, Sub-Index 02h of the device and compare it to the actual value, and the Boot-Up for that device is only continued on exact equality.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canRevisionNumber
MetaDataPointU32.Description: 1F87h RevisionNumber: List of expected RevisionNumber (Object 1018h Sub-Index 03h) for each expected slave device. Sub-Index 00h has the value 127d. Each sub-index in the array correspond to the slave with the Node-ID equal to the sub-index. If a value in this array is not 0, on Boot-Up procedure the Master will read object 1018h, Sub-Index 03h of the device and compare it to the actual value. As revision number include major and minor revision, the BootUp for that device is only continued on "exact mach" on the major revision and "greater than" on minor revision number.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: canSerialNumber
MetaDataPointU32.Description: 1F88h SerialNumber: List of expected SerialNumber (Object 1018h Sub-Index 04h) for each expected slave device. Sub-Index 00h has the value 127d. Each sub-index in the array correspond to the slave with the Node-ID equal to the sub-index. If a value in this array is not 0, on Boot-Up procedure the Master will read object 1018h, Sub-Index 04h of the device and compare it to the actual value, and the Boot-Up for that device is only continued on exact equality

MetaDataPointU8.Description: Number of entries of the appliance information structure

MetaDataPointVisibleString.Name: parApDeviceInfoManufacturerCode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApDeviceInfoDeviceObdVersion

MetaDataPointU32.Description: Article number of the device

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApDeviceInfoDeviceConfigurationTableVersion
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Device Configuration table version

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApDeviceInfoSoftwareBranchInformation
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Version of the branch that this SW version origins from.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApDeviceInfoSoftwareReleaseType
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Type of software release.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApDeviceInfoBuildVersion
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Build version of the device software

MetaDataPointTimeOfDay.Name: parApErrorTimeStamp
MetaDataPointTimeOfDay.Description: Timestamps for errors. Gives the time at which the errors stored in obd 1003 occurred.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApErrorTrendLog
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Trending string showing the state of the device at the moment of the error defined in obd 1003.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parApErrorCustomCode
MetaDataPointU32.Description: The custom error code shows the priority and the count of the error. Subindeces relate to the corresponding sub index in the obd 1003.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApErrorCurrentErrorCounter
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Counter for how many consecutive times the current error has happened with the same status and sub status.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parApDeviceInfoFlattened
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Flattened version of 0x2001.X + CANBus line number + Revision Number, for CANIP Registration functionality. Note: Line number and manufacturer code are optional.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parFunctionGroup
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Holds the defined function groups information (requested by the master). This configuration is used by the master to auto connect PDOs belonging to function groups.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parConnections
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Connection matrix showing all function group interconnection over the CAN bus.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApCriticalLevel
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Defines the critical level a device has as slave. If not present then transient. (0 = permanent and safety critical, 1 = permanent and leads to functional loss, 2 = permanent but no serious consequences, FE = transient)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varCachedCriticalLevel
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Object on the master where critical levels of the slaves are stored for each slave (sub index relates to node id on the bus)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varApLostNodeId
MetaDataPointU8.Description: List of node IDs that were connected to the system but are missing. The nodes will be be removed on reset.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parSubSystemIdentification
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Sub System identification information. This contains version / ident information for a subsystem such as safety unit.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApDeviceInfoBootLoaderNumberOfEntries
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Number of Entries of the device information bootloader structure

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parApDeviceInfoBootLoaderVersion
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Indicates the version of the boot loader for this device. This object is only supported if the device is configured with a bootloader.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApLocale
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Location enumerator following the ISO3166-1. Written by MK3+ or RU indicates which country the unit resides in.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApTimeNTPupdateEnabled
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Is the NTP update enabled for time keeping. This parameter is part of a internet connected device that can send NTP updates.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varApRoomUnitSendsOTP1
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: The reply of the Room Unit on MobileApplicationInitiatesPairing, contains the requested pairing code.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varApMobileApplicationInitiatesPairing
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Sent by the Mobile Application, indicating to a Room Unit that it wants to start a new pairing session.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parApBridgeTargetNode
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Contains the node and communication line number addressing of a target device on a remote L-bus. DO NOT TRANSLATE

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: varApBridgeTargetNodeActual
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Contains the current node and communication line number addressing of a target device on a remote L-bus. DO NOT TRANSLATE

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parComBusLength
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter setting the bus length based on distance

MetaDataPointU32.Description: Serial number of the device

MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Custom serial number of the device

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parApDeviceMK1InfoArticleNumber
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Article number of the device

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApApplianceInfoFlattened
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Flattened version of 0x2000.X, 0x2001.X, configuration number, CANBus line number and Revision Number Note: Line number is optional.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApPrdmGatewayInfo
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Gateway Information needed for administration usage.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApRemoteResetAllowed
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: This parameter indicates if reset from what type of remote source, if any, is allowed.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApBridgeAutoConnect
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Contains the bridged node where the device should automatically connect when authenticated

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApModbusAlternateMapping
MetaDataPointU8.Description: propose an alternative mapping for different systems: If parApModbusAlternateMapping = 0 the register 259 is the same as the heat demand PDO (7 : Heating and 8 : Cooling) if parApModbusAlternateMapping = 1 for Siemens systems, register 259 is 1: Cooling and 2: Heating

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApCanMasterLost
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Device was L-Bus slave but is capable of being L-Bus master, but current master is lost. Lockout the device and wait for installer interaction.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApStartPairing
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Sent from internet gateway to server to start pairing process

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApOneTimePassword
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Written by server to internet gateway to return one time password

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApPairingCommand
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Pairing command from a specific device to enable remote pairing

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApPairingRequested
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Pairing request from a specific device to enable remote pairing

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parRuRegistrationRequest
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Request from an internet gateway that wants to register with the registration service (RRCQ)

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parRuRegistrationResponse
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Response from the registration service to the internet gateway when the registration is successful (RRGS)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcStayOnIgnitionLevelTimer
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Time to stay on start power after valid flame detection

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDThMaxLevel1
MetaDataPointU16.Description: maximum heat exchanger temperature gradient before power output limitations

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDThMaxLevel2
MetaDataPointU16.Description: maximum heat exchanger temperature gradient before the output is set to low load

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDThMaxLevel3
MetaDataPointU16.Description: maximum heat exchanger temperature gradient before the burner is switched off due to a blocking.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFanI
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Integral gain of the fan RPM controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFanP
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Proportional gain of the fan RPM controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFanPulses
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Hall sensor pulses per rotation fan

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanRpmChMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum RPM fan for CH

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanRpmMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Minimal RPM fan

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanRpmStart
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Ignition RPM fan

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHeGpsCheck
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: GPS check enabled? Is an external gas pressure switch connected and should it be used in the control of the appliance.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeKw10kRpm
MetaDataPointU16.Description: kW heat at 10000 RPM

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMaxAbsTfTh
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max delta Tf-Th before blocking

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMaxAbsThTf
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max delta Th-Tf before blocking

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMaxAbsThTr
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max delta Th-Tr before blocking

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcPowerLimiter
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Dinamico GVC specific parameter which selects a power limitation curve within the GVC. Used for limiting the maximum power output on a certain heat exchanger (E.g. maximum 28 kW on a 30 kW heat exchanger)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHePostPurgeTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Fan running time after burner stop

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHePowerMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Absolute max boiler power in KW. This is the power the device can produce when burner parameters are set at maximum.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHeFlueSystemRelativePressure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: This parameter converts the pressure, relative pressure compared to the ambient, of the flue gas system to a % of power correction which is used by the GVC (parGvcMaxPowerCorrection)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHePrePurgeTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Fan running time before burner start

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHeRpm0Kw
MetaDataPointI16.Description: RPM at 0kW heat

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeTdiffModulating
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum delta T for the heat exchanger. Modulate back when delta temperature is larger than this treshold.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeTfaFilterTau
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Time constant for Tfa calculation

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeThMaxBlocking
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max Th before blocking

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHeVpsCheck
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: VPS check enabled?

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHePreIgnitionTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Pre ignition time

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMassFlowMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Mimimum mass flow

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMassFlowMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum mass flow

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHeMinMassFlowTempDevlimit
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Minimum mass flow deviation limit flow temperature

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHeMaxMassFlowTempDevlimit
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Maximum mass flow deviation limit flow temperature????

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeTreturnCorrection
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Enable compensation for return temperature measurement for correction of position of the T return sensor

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlueGasTempMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max FlueGas Temperature

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMaxAbsTfTr
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max delta Tf-Tr before blocking

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parGvcGasTypeRpmTable
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Mapping table for setting various fan setpoints based on the selected gas type.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApCommissioningSetupCompleted
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: This parameter indicates that the device commissioning setup function is executed. When set to yes, no initial commissioning setup will appear. When no setup is available for the device, the default should be set to yes.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApCommissioningDeairCompleted
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: This parameter indicates that deairation is performed at least once.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeJumper3ChRpmMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Jumper setting to limit max rpm CH for LPG

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeHeatLoadMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compensation for heat exchange area between water entry point and water measurement point in heatexchanger. The real temperature at the hydraulic entry point is calculated based on three factors. Actual Heat load factor, Return temperature correction factor and dTCorrectionfactor . Power where the return temperature is minimal corrected

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMassFlowMaxDhw
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum mass flow for DHW

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMassFlowMaxCh
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum mass flow for CH

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlowTestDeltaT
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Delta which must be seen on the flow temperature during the circulation test.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFlowTestDuration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Duration of the circulation test

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlowTestBlockingTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Time to resolve the circulation blocking by running the pump.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlowTestBlockingDeltaT
MetaDataPointU16.Description: During circulation blocking a delta T flow must be seen to exit the blocking

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeHeatLoadMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compensation for heat exchange area between water entry point and water measurement point in heatexchanger. The real temperature at the hydraulic entry point is calculated based on three factors. Actual Heat load factor, Return temperature correction factor and dTCorrectionfactor . Power where the return temperature is maximal corrected

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFanD
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Differential gain of the fan RPM controller

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanRpmMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum fan speed

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHeGasTypeSelector
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Gas type selector

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlueGasPowerLimitTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Flue gas temperature before limited power

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeCorrectionDtMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compensation for heat exchange area between water entry point and water measurement point in heatexchanger. The real temperature at the hydraulic entry point is calculated based on three factors. Actual Heat load factor, Return temperature correction factor and dTCorrectionfactor . Correction of return sensor at minimum dT (Flow - Return).

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcDataBlockEntries
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Number of entries of data blocks for GVC transfer.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parGvcDataBlock1
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Data blocks for GVC transfer. Data contents may vary across different GVC implementations, refer to corresponding GVC specification. Mechanism may be used for simple data transfer, when amount of data exceeds maximum, please implement GVC Block Transfer

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parGvcDataBlock2
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Data blocks for GVC transfer. Data contents may vary across different GVC implementations, refer to corresponding GVC specification. Mechanism may be used for simple data transfer, when amount of data exceeds maximum, please implement GVC Block Transfer

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parGvcDataBlock3
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Data blocks for GVC transfer. Data contents may vary across different GVC implementations, refer to corresponding GVC specification. Mechanism may be used for simple data transfer, when amount of data exceeds maximum, please implement GVC Block Transfer

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parGvcDataBlock4
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Data blocks for GVC transfer. Data contents may vary across different GVC implementations, refer to corresponding GVC specification. Mechanism may be used for simple data transfer, when amount of data exceeds maximum, please implement GVC Block Transfer

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parChMaxPowerCorrection
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Correction on the maximum power output for Central Heating. Increase or decrease the fan speed in %. Due to different pressures of any system the fan speed related to the complete power range can be corrected by a few %, defined by the min and max property

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFanPwmMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: minimal PWM for the fan controller

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanRpmPrePurge
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Prepurge RPM

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHePowerMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Absolute minimum power output of the device in kW. This is the power the device can produce when burner parameters are set at minimum.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeJumper3RpmMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: jumper setting to limit min rpm for LPG

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeJumper3DhwRpmMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Jumper setting to limit max rpm DHW for LPG

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeCorrectionDtMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compensation for heat exchange area between water entry point and water measurement point in heatexchanger. The real temperature at the hydraulic entry point is calculated based on three factors. Actual Heat load factor, Return temperature correction factor and dTCorrectionfactor. Correction at Max dT (Flow - Return)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHe2ndReturnEnabled
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Enable disable 2nd return sensor

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeCorrectionTreturnMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compensation for heat exchange area between water entry point and water measurement point in heatexchanger. The real temperature at the hydraulic entry point is calculated based on three factors. Actual Heat load factor, Return temperature correction factor and dTCorrectionfactor. Correction factor on minimum return temperature

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeCorrectionTreturnMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compensation for heat exchange area between water entry point and water measurement point in heatexchanger. The real temperature at the hydraulic entry point is calculated based on three factors. Actual Heat load factor, Return temperature correction factor and dTCorrectionfactor. Correction factor at maximum return temperature

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMaxDtPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: To optimize the allowed delta between flow and return over the total power range. The maximum delta between flow and return can be used without stressing the heat exchanger. The additional modulation is based on the actual power. The parameters define the allowed delta on the boundaries of the power parHePowerMin and parHePowerMax. Three areas in the power range can be defined. Maximum load where parHeTDiffModulating is used

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMinDtPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: To optimize the allowed delta between flow and return over the total power range. The maximum delta between flow and return can be used without stressing the heat exchanger. The additional modulation is based on the actual power. The parameters define the allowed delta on the boundaries of the power parHePowerMin and parHePowerMax. Three areas in the power range can be defined. Minimum load where parHeTDiffModulating is used

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHeMaxTdiffModulatingAtPowerMax
MetaDataPointI16.Description: To optimize the allowed delta between flow and return over the total power range. The maximum delta between flow and return can be used without stressing the heat exchanger. The additional modulation is based on the actual power. The parameters define the allowed delta on the boundaries of the power parHePowerMin and parHePowerMax. Three areas in the power range can be defined. Delta T is linear calculated between this parameter and parHeTdiffModulating

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHeMaxTdiffModulatingAtPowerMin
MetaDataPointI16.Description: To optimize the allowed delta between flow and return over the total power range.The maximum delta between flow and return can be used without stressing the heat exchanger. The additional modulation is based on the actual power. The parameters define the allowed delta on the boundaries of the power parHePowerMin and parHePowerMax. Three areas in the power range can be defined. Delta T is linear calculated between this parameter and parHeTdiffModulating

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHe2ndReturnTdiffModulating
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max delta between 2nd return and flow temperature in case of 2nd return sensor enabled

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDhwOutTestDeltaTemperature
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Minimum change of the DHW out sensor value during the flatness test

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeDhwOutTestDuration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Duration of the flatness test for DHW operation.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parChPumpSpeedRamp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: The ramp-up of the pump in % / sec when pump is in CH-mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlueGasTemperatureSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Fluegas temperature setpoint

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFlueGasTemperatureHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Hysteresis fluegas temperature setpoint

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcModStopOnBurnerTemperatureDeviation
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Massflow delta to stop power modulation. Massflow deviates too much form matching actual burner temperature in burner profile.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcLPGhStepMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: LPG max stepper valve position for gas family detection

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcModulationSpeed
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Set modulation speed of gasvalve stepper to mainting burner set temperature

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcE2PidProportionalGain
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the P action in PID controller of the burner temperature controller.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcE2PidIntegralGain
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the I action in PID controller of the burner temperature controller.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcE2PidDifferentialGain
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the D action in PID controller of the burner temperature controller.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcIgnitionMassFlow
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Mass flow in gram/seconds when ignition takes place

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcStartOffsetFactor
MetaDataPointU8.Description: part of ignition procedure. Procedure not fully specified. Description not clear

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcRampIncreaseIncrement
MetaDataPointU8.Description: part of ignition procedure. Procedure not fully specified. Description not clear

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcOverlapSteps
MetaDataPointU8.Description: part of ignition procedure. Procedure not fully specified. Description not clear

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHeGvcMassFlowTempDeviationMin
MetaDataPointI8.Description: The relation between temperature and Mass flow in the burner profile can be shifted

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHeGvcMassFlowTempDeviationMax
MetaDataPointI8.Description: The relation between temperature and Mass flow in the burner profile can be shifted

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcGasTypeKnown
MetaDataPointU8.Description: parameter to store the status if the gas type is known

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcFlueBlockRpmMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Fluegas block setting, max rpm on min massflow. liniare relation ship with fleugas max setting

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcFlueBlockRpmMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Fluegas block setting, max rpm on max massflow. liniare relation ship with fleugas min setting

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcLoadAdaptionGvPosMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gasvalve stepper position treshold for load adaptation. Load in increased to ensure stable burning.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcLoadAdaptionGvPosMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: When the gas valve stepper is at this position the mass flow max is set to igntion mass flow. The burner setpoint can not be reached boiler is in limited mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcLoadAdaptionRpmMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: When the gas valve stepper is at this position the mass flow min is set to igntion mass flow. The burner setpoint can not be reached boiler is in limited mode

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHeGvcEnrichFactorNAT
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Add steps to gasvalve stepper when entering state burn for nat gas

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHeGvcEnrichFactorLPG
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Add steps to gasvalve stepper when entering state burn for lpg gas

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcGasValveDeltaLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum offset for the gas valve position to the burner profile stepper position

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcColdBurnerDetectionTemp
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Cold burner detection temp

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGvcCoolingDownBurnerTemp
MetaDataPointU8.Description: When the burner temperature is above this setting the fan is running to cool down the burner.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeAppliancePrepurgeSpeed
MetaDataPointU8.Description: ?Klopt deze? De naam en de translation matchen niet. -Averaged determined fan RPM at prepurge

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeHeatExchangerTau
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heatexchanger time constant used for power control algorithms

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeMassFlowP
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Proportional gain of the massflow controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeMassFlowI
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Integral gain of the massflow controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeMassFlowD
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Differential gain of the massflow controller

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeGradient1PowerReductionFactor
MetaDataPointU16.Description: During low flow situations gradient 1 protection is entered (>parHeDThMaxLevel1). To prevent entering gradient 2 protection (>parHeDThMaxLevel2), the power must be reduced. The amount of reduction is controlled by this parameter.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeFeedForwardFactor
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Feed foward scaling on CH to leave room for PID controller. Feed forward based on CH flow rate

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDeltaTTau
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Delay the feed forward CH effect of Delta T at low flow. Feed forward based on CH flow rate

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHePIDMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: limit the range/effect of the PID contoller in %

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHeDhwOutTestThreshold
MetaDataPointI16.Description: The threshold above which temperature the flatnesstest for DHW should be performed

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parGvcCalibrationPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The power where the SCOT system does the calibration. It needs to find the ionisation base setting for the calibration curve

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcIonBaseAdjust
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Here the ionization base value can be modified in order to have small corrections on the lambda. This can only be done after a 100% calibration. The installer must check the combustion before correcting the lambda.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeMinFlameCurrent
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum flame current for pneumatic combustion warning

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parGvcIgnitionPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This is the power in % to ignite the burner

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeMinimumPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Correction on the minimum power output. Increase the minimum fan speed %

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcModulatorIgnitionOffset
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Additional offset to the default gas valve modulator setting, added at a burner start

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parGvcMaxPowerCorrection
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Correction on the maximum power output for Domestic Hot Water. Increase or decrease the fan speed in %. Due to different pressures of any system the fan speed related to the complete power range can be corrected by a few %, defined by the min and max property

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeReducedDtHeatExchanger
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Reduced delta heat exchanger temperature at the absolute maximum flow temperature setpoint

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeReducedFlowTempMaxAtMaxDt
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The maximum flow temperature setpoint for the nominal delta heat exchanger temperature.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDtSlopeEndpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Delta T slope endpoint. Determines the slope for the flow temperature reduction on increased delta T setting.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parGvcConfigWritten
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Safety parameters are successfully written to GVC

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcIonBaseSlope
MetaDataPointU8.Description: The ionisation base at low load up to calibration load, a reduction of the ionization base value. This is an additional reduction to parGvcIonBaseAdjust. Specification images are needed to clarify more for this parameter.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parGvcTableConfiguration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This data point holds an unique ID to identify the set of data points, safety parameter table, in the SCOT GVC. This is for the user to verify if the programmed boiler variant matches the boiler type plate. This parameter can not be written by the user or any external device.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeChMaxPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This is the maximum allowed power that can be used for central heating. This is a percentage of the full adjustable modulation range, so not between low load (can be more than 0%) and max load but absolute minimum (0%) and max (100%)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeDhwMaxPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This is the maximum allowed power that can be used for dometical hot water. This is a percentage of the full adjustable modulation range, so not between low load (can be more than 0%) and max load but absolute minimum (0%) and max (100%)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parGvcCommissioningCalibrationCompleted
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: This parameter indicates/triggers that a 100 % calibration is done at least once. Before the boiler is opeational 100 % calibration must be done, after a power cycle this may not be triggered again.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApCalibrationForcedDhwPrepurgeTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Before the burner can start the forced Dhw calibration the fan must cool down the heat exchanger using the outside air. This is done pre-purge at the minimum speed set by the boiler

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parGvcGasValveOperational
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Self-Learing mechanism for gas valve control has been executed

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcCapacitySelection
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Capacity selection of Dinamico GVC

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcCombCoeffEntries
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Amount of combustion coefficient parameters

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parGvcCombCoeffMinCapacity
MetaDataPointI8.Description: CO2 adjustment on minimum capacity

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parGvcCombCoeffAvgCapacity
MetaDataPointI8.Description: CO2 adjustment on burner start capacity

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parGvcCombCoeffMaxCapacity
MetaDataPointI8.Description: CO2 adjustment on maximum capacity

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanMaxDeltaIncrease
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum step to increase fan speed * 10rpm per second.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeFanMaxDeltaDecrease
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum step to decrease the fan speed multiply with 10rpm / sec

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHePGradient
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Proportional factor CH gradient controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeIGradient
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Integral factor CH gradient controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeDGradient
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Derivative factor CH gradient controller

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeGradientControlSwitchPoint
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Degrees below CH temperature setpoint for switching from gradient control to temperature control.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeGradientSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat exchanger temperature gradient control setpoint

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHeChimneyDhwEnabled
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Enable the DHW circuit during chimney sweep

MetaDataPointU32.Name: parApColdStartTime
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Minimal duration time between two cold starts

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parGvcLowNoise
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Low noise operation mode. This reduces the amount of noise generated by the modulating gas valve. It reduces the regulation behavior of the gas valve. This will cause the gas valve and the combustion quality to be less efficient.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: parApWaterPressureSensorConfigurationTable
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Configuration table for various water pressure sensors in one single software. Pressure and ADC value are mapped together to create a look-up table.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApWaterPressureSensorTolerance
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Tolerance of water pressure sensor before it gives an error. Percentages is calculated over the max ADC value before triggering an error.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parGvcGasTypeConfirm
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Confirms gas type change

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeMaxNumberOfResistors
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum number of resistors used

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeResistorSwitchOnDelay
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Resistor switch on delay

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeCascadeResistorSwitchOnTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Resistor switch On Time for cascade regulation

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeCascadeResistorSwitchOffTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Resistor Switch Off Time for cascade regulation

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcGasValveModulators
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter set the number of gas valve modulators present in the appliance. The number of gas valve modulators can be increased to facilitate a higher volumetric flow rate. Gas valve modulators are used in EC appliances.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeCascadeGradientFlowTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Cascade flow temperature gradient in a defined time not to be exceeded

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcSafetyConfiguration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Selects a safety configuration in the comfort core to send to the safety core.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApFlueGasSensorConnected
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Flue Gas sensor is connected, when no flue gas sensor is measured an error will be displayed. Detection of a flue gas sensor is automatic.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHeCommissioningPowerSetpoint
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Custom power setpoint for commissioning mode (chimney sweep) in %

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcO2SensorStatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: OM501 (Resideo) O2 sensor status bits bit 0: OUT_OF_FS_RANGE 1: SENSOR_EOL 2: DIFF_M1-M2 3: FLUE_CAL_RUNS 4: AIR_CAL_RUNS 5: WARN_TIMEOUT_STAB

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcOM501CommunicationState
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Communication state of the OM501 O2 sensor controller

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parGvcMdtPositionTable
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Start positions of the throttle

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeO2Dip
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Lowest measured O2 value at ignition cycle

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parGvcO2Deadband
MetaDataPointU8.Description: deadband of O2 setpoint (for debugging/development) 1 = 0,1 %

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeGvcDownModulationSwitchpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint at which down modulation must be limited

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHeGvcDownModulationGradient
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Down modulation limited gradient

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpOutdoorBivalentTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Outside temperature level above which the backup operation is blocked for a standard heating mode.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpCompressorLock
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The contents of this parameter locks or unlocks the compressor operation.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMaxTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum flow temperature authorized on the outlet of the condenser. If the temperature becomes higher then the compressor is switched off.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMinCoolingTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Minimum flow temperature authorized on the outlet of the condenser in cooling mode. If the temperature becomes lower then the compressor is switched off.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Temperature hysteresis relative to the flow temperature setpoint. In heating mode , exceeding the high level switches off the generator and exceeding the low level switches on the generator. In Cooling mode it's the opposit.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpAntiShortCycleTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum downtime of the compressor after a stop

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDelayLpError
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Time of presence of the low pressure error before being rised.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDelayHpError
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Time of presence of the high pressure error before being rised.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDelayFsError
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Time of presence of a source side flow rate error before being rised.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpPressureBalanceTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Delay time to ensure a sufficient differential pressure before switching the 4 way valve

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMinFlowmeter
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Minimum flow rate allowed in the heating circuit

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMessFlowmeter
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Minimum heating circuit flow rate that triggers a warning message indicating that flow is going low

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpMinTO
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Outdoor temperature below which the pumps starts to ensure the frost protection

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpGshpMaxTempDhw
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum flow temperature (including backups and compressor) authorized to produce Domestic Hot Water

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitDipSwitchConfiguration
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: This parameter contains the DIP switch cofiguration of the interface electronic board located in the indoor unit

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpReqTempDiffCondenser
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of the delta Temperature between flow and return on the central heating side. This setpoint is used when a constant condenser delta T control is enabled.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMaxDevTempDiffCondenser
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum overshoot authorized on the deltaT of the condenser when the constant condenser delta T control is enabled.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpCondPumpModulation
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Enable/disable the central heating pump modulation to control the constant deltaT of the condenser

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitErrorRateLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Acceptable error level of the communication frame between the controller electronic board and the interface electronic board. The higher the value is, the better is the communication.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpSourcePumpPreRun
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Operation time of the source pump before the compressor starts

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpSourcePumpPostRun
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Operation time of the source pump after the compressor has stopped.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpReqTempDiffEvaporator
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of the delta Temperature between flow and return on the source side from the evaporator. This setpoint is used when a constant evaporator delta T control is enabled.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMaxDevTempDiffEvaporator
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum overshoot authorized on the deltaT of the evaporator when the constant evaporator delta T control is enabled.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpSourcePumpSpeedMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum source pump speed (%)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpSourcePumpSpeedMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum source pump speed (%)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpSourcePumpModulation
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Enable/disable the source pump modulation to control the constant deltaT of the evaporator

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpStandbyTimeEvaporator
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Source pump and heat pump standby time in case of a too low source temperature

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpMinEvaporatorTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Minimum source temperature authorized on the inlet or outlet of the evaporator

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpLowNoiseFrequency
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Contains the compressor frequency setpoint in low noise mode

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpBackupType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Set the type of backup used in the heat pump.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDelayGeneratorStart
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Delay for starting the next generator (backup stage) in central heating mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDelayGeneratorStop
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Delay to stop the next generator (backup stage) when the setpoint is reached in central heating mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBoilerBackupPumpPostRunning
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Operation time of the hydraulic backup pump after the burner has stopped

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpElectricPulseValency
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Pulse valency of the electrical meter (Wh)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackup1StageCapacity
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Capacity of the 1st electrical backup stage - Deprecated to be replaced by higher resolution datapoints

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackup2StageCapacity
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Capacity of the 2nd electrical backup stage- Deprecated to be replaced by higher resolution datapoints

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpGlycol
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Rate of glycol in the installation (%)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpCompressorCoeffA
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Coefficient A used for the characteristics of the compressor shape

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCompressorCoeffB
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Coefficient B used for the characteristics of the compressor shape

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCondensationTempTk
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Condensation temperature Tk used for the characteristics of the compressor shape.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpEvaporationTempTo
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Evaporation temperature T0 used for the characteristics of the compressor shape.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCondPinch
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Pinching temperature of the condensor in heating mode

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpEvapPinch
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Pinching temperature of the evaporator in heating mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpLowNoiseControlFactor
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Coefficient used in the low noise algorithm

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpInstallConfiguration
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Configuration of the HP installation: 0 : ambiant air 1 : duct

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHysteresisLimitPacHigh
MetaDataPointU16.Description: On/Off hysteresis Heat Pump high

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHysteresisLimitPacLow
MetaDataPointU16.Description: On/Off hysteresis heat pump low

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpTimeLowOutsideTemp
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum time at minimum outside temperature to start back up in CH mode when dynamic timer selected

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpTimeHighOutsideTemp
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum time at maximum outside temperature to start back up in CH mode when dynamic timer selected

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpLowOutsideTempValue
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Minimum outside temperature for dynamic timer when dynamic mode is selected

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpHighOutsideTempValue
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum outside temperature for dynamic timer when dynamic mode is selected

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpMinimumOutsideTemperatureHP
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Minimum outside temperature below which Heat Pump is stopped

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMaximumOutsideHybridEnabled
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum outside temperature to allow Heat Pump to operate

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpAmbientTempRefreshTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Duration of ambient air refresh step

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCOPThreshold
MetaDataPointU16.Description: COP threshold above which heat pump is authorized to operate when hybrid mode is primary energy

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCOPHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Coefficient of Performance Hysteresis

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpFanPostRunTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Duration of Fan post run time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpAmbientTempMinRunComp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Min ambient temperature to allow the compressor to run

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpSilentMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Enabling Heat pump Silent mode

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpAmbientTempMaxRunComp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Max ambient temperature to allow the compressor to run

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpFlowTemperatureAveragePeriode
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump Flow Temperature average

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpHybrid
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Hybrid mode selected

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridElectricalCostTariff1
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Hybrid Electricity cost in high tarif

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridElectricalCostTariff2
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Hybrid Electricity cost in low tarif

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridGasOilCost
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Cost of fossil energy (oil or gas) - price per litre or per m3

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridCoefEmCO2ElecCH
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Electrical CO2 emission in heating mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridCoefEmCO2ElecDHW
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Electrical CO2 emission in DHW mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridCoefEmCO2GasOil
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gas or Oil CO2 emission

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpHybridBoilerEfficiency
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Boiler in appliance efficiency

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpFlowSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat Pump flow speed set-point depending on Heat Pump Power configuration

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpTRMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Minimum Heat Pump return temperature to start backup during defrosting

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpTRMaxStop
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum Heat Pump Return Temperature to stop heat pump during defrosting

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpTFMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat Pump flow temperature to stop Heat Pump during defrosting

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpTFMaxStop
MetaDataPointU16.Description: HPTF to stop HP

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHysteresisHeatpumpMin
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat pump minimum hysteresis

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHysteresisHeatpumpMax
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat pump maximum hysteresis

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpCompressorWarmupTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Compressor warmup step duration

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpDefrostDetectionGap
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Defrost detection gap (definition of threshold)

MetaDataPointI8.Name: parHpMaxTimeBackupOffPeak
MetaDataPointI8.Description: max time used for electrical backup start delaying when peak mode is active

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDeltaCooling
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum Cooling offset

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpRelHumidity
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum humidity to start the cooling offset

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpDtForBackupOff
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Delta T for DHW electrical backup delayed start computation

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDefrostTimeDelay
MetaDataPointU16.Description: defrost delay to consider curative defrost (stabilisation time of the need of defrost)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpGroundSourceHeatpumpType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Type of ground source heat pump

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCoolCondPinch
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Pinching temperature of the condenser in cooling mode

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpCoolEvapPinch
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Pinching temperature of the evaporator in cooling mode

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpBufferTankEnabled
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Enable buffer tank function for heat pump

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpBufferTankHysterisis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: buffer tank hysterisis to start and stop heating

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpNeutralBandHysteresisHigh
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Hysteresis to stop heat production

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpNeutralBandHysteresisLow
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Hysteresis to start heat production

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMaxErrorGain
MetaDataPointU16.Description: max error gain to send for backup hydraulic

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpOffsetChPhotovoltaic
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Add Offset to CH setpoint when Photovoltaic function is enabled

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpOffsetDhwPhotovoltaic
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Add Offset to the Dhw setpoint when Photovoltaic function is enabled

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpMax05VHpChSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum output of heat source pump

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpStartTimeLowNoise
MetaDataPointU8.Description: start Time fot Low Noise Function

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpStopTimeLowNoise
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Stop Time For Low Noise Function

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuCHmaxTset
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Max CH Setpoint of backup PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuDhwTset
MetaDataPointU8.Description: hydraulic Backup PCU dhw setpoint

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpBackupPcuDhwMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Dhw mode of Hydraulic Backup PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuPumpPostRun
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Pump Post Run of Hydraulic Backup PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuRpmMaxCh
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum CH Air flow Hydraulic Backup PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuRpmMaxDhw
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum Dhw Air flow Hydraulic Backup PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuRpmMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum Air flow Hydraulic Backup PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuPumpSpeedMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: CH minimum pump speed backup Pcu

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuPumpSpeedMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: CH maximum pump speed Hydraulic Backup PCU

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpBackupPcuPresent
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Backup PCU present Yes or No

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpFlowmeterType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Type of flowmeter equipped

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpBackupPcuRpmMinOffset
MetaDataPointU8.Description: PCU Airflow Minimal offset Backup

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpTempoBetweenStagesCh
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Delay time for switching on the next generator in Central Heating mode

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpGroundSourceHeatPumpPowerType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Capacity of the heat pump

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpSmartStopHeatPumpAlgorithm
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The smart stop heat pump function stops heat pump with a voltage of 0.8V, after smart stop heat pump timer,it goes to 0.2V

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpSmartStopHeatPumpTimer
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Timer when smart stop heat pump algorithm is activated

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitManufacturer
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Brand of outdoor unit used in the system

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpBackupPcuDfDuConfiguration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter used to set the dFdU of PCU

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpPumpSpeedMax
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Max pump speed for the HP pump. The HP pump is present if the hydraulic of the indoor unit contains a buffer tank. The HP pump is located between the condenser and the buffer tank.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpPumpSpeedMin
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum pump speed for the HP pump. The HP pump is present if the hydraulic of the indoor unit contains a buffer tank. The HP pump is located between the condenser and the buffer tank.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpPumpPostRun
MetaDataPointU8.Description: HP pump post operation time after shutdown of the compressor.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpIPump
MetaDataPointU8.Description: I factor of the PID control of the condenser water pump speed

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDPump
MetaDataPointU8.Description: D factor of the PID control of the condenser water pump speed

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpPPump
MetaDataPointU8.Description: P factor of the PID control of the condenser water pump speed

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpPIRangePump
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Pump PI control range

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpMaxCompressorDhwTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum Dhw temperature inside the tank that allows the compressor to operate

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDhwFlowSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat Pump flow speed set-point depending on Heat Pump Power configuration in Dhw mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDhwBackupCapacity
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Capacity of the DHW electrical backup stage

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Type of outdoor unit used

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpDefrostFactorMin
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Defrost preventive diagnostic over factor value min

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpDefrostFactorMax
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Defrost preventive diagnostic over factor value max

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpDigitalInput1
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Digital input configuration 0 - off 1 - smartGrid 2 - release compressor 3 - release backup

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpDigitalInput2
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Digital input configuration 0 - off 1 - smartGrid 2 - release compressor 3 - release backup

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpDigitalInput1ContactLogic
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Logic contact to take into account for digital input: 0 : normalyOpen - digital input is considered active when digital input contact is open 1 : normalyClose - digital input is considered active when digital input contact is closed

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpDigitalInput2ContactLogic
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Logic contact to take into account for digital input: 0 : normalyOpen - digital input is considered active when digital input contact is open 1 : normalyClose - digital input is considered active when digital input contact is closed

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDtForBackupOffTimeBase
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Delta T base time for DHW electrical backup delayed start computation

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpPumpDownAlarmThreshold
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Pump down alarm threshold

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpDelayBeforeBackupStartInHours
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Time before starting backup

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpDefrostDeviationRate
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Deviation rate used for diagnostic

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpBackup1StageCapacityAccurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Capacity of the 1st electrical backup stage

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpBackup2StageCapacityAccurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Capacity of the 2nd electrical backup stage

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpPipingSelection
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter must be set wether the the pipe length is higer or lower than 10m length 2 Values: Yes (>10m) No (<10m)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpEnergyConsumption
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The setting of this parameter specifies whether the electric energy consumption of the heat pump must be calculated from an external meter or being estimated from the information received by the heat pump.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpEmergencyMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The end user can choose if the backup has to always start (Comfort), temporary start (for a limited duration) or not (Energy saving) when the heat pump is in failure (Emergency mode)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpManualDefrost
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The end user can manualy start or stop the defrosting cycle of the heat pump

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpOvershootLimitation
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This parameter defines the maximum acceptable overshoot of the heat pump flow temperature compared to the setpoint temperature. If the flow temperature becomes higher, then the copressor must be stopped

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpMinOperatingTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This parameter defines the minimum operating time of the compressor before stop. The compressor can only be stoped for emergency reasons before the timeout.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parDhwOduOptimisation
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Optimize ODU restart time with recooling. If activated the heatpump will be actively cooled down to speed up its restart.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpAntiCycleTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Minimum downtime of the compressor after a stop

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCoolingNeutralBandHysteresisHigh
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Hysteresis stop heat production in cooling

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpInterfaceMaxCurrentLimitation
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum current limitation of the ODU

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDeltaTemperatureChSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of delta temperature to send to ODU in CH

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpFlowTempStopODU
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Minimum flow temperature which allows the compressor to operate. (Was previously fixed at 10 C)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpPressureSensorExternal
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: pressure value sensor is taken from external sensor

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpFlowTempStartODU
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Minimum flow temperature which allows the compressor to restart after parHpFlowTempStopODU protection. (Was previously fixed at 20 C).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpSourceFlowSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: flow setpoint for the source

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpSourcePowerLimitation
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Power limitation on GHSP

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpSourceMinTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: minimum temperature released allowed in the source

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parHpSourceMaxTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: maximum temperature released allowed in the source

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpSourceGlycol

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of delta temperature to send to ODU in DHW

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpDeltaTemperatureCoolingSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of delta temperature to send to ODU in cooling

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCoolingFlowSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Flow setpoint to send to ODU in Cooling

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpExpectedModel
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Thermal capacity expected

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpExpectedType
MetaDataPointU8.Description: expected type of ODU

MetaDataPointU8.Description: parameter set for fan PWM control in Half speed mode (speed 1)

MetaDataPointU8.Description: setpoint set for fan PWM control in full speed mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpExpectedMasterOutdoorUnitType
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Expected master (in cascade configuration) outdoor unit type based on the type of refrigerant used and the nominal power value

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitCount
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Used to configure the number of ODUs present. By default the one directly connected to the EHC is Master.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHybridElectricalCostTariff1Accurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Hybrid Electricity cost in high tarif accurate

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpCapacitySetpointStart
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Initial value of capacity setpoint which guarantees to start the compressor

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parHpHydraulicBackupInParalell

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHybridElectricalCostTariff2Accurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Hybrid Electricity cost in low tarif accurate

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpHybridGasOilCostAccurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Cost of fossil energy (oil or gas) - price per litre or per m3 accurate

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitControlType
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Control request type for Outdoor unit ((0 = PID, 1 = Setpoint 0-10V, 2 = SetPoint BMS, 3 = Request compressor 0-10V, 4 = Request compresor 0-100 BMS)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitLowNoiseCompressorSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Compressor Speed in Hz Used to manage ODU in silent mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpOutdoorUnitLowNoiseFanSpeed

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parHpExpectedSlaveOutdoorUnitType

MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency increase protection upper threshold tripping time

MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency increase protection lower threshold. Parameter is the delta value to the nominal frequency: fN + x

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterFrequencyIncProtectLowThreshTrippingTime
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency increase protection lower threshold tripping time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterFrequencyDecProtectUpThreshold
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency decrease protection upper threshold. Parameter is the delta value to the nominal frequency: fN - x

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterFrequencyDecProtectUpThreshTrippingTime
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency decrease protection upper threshold tripping time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterFrequencyDecProtectLowThreshold
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency decrease protection lower threshold. Parameter is the delta value to the nominal frequency: fN - x

MetaDataPointI16.Description: Grid interface protection according EN50438. Frequency decrease protection lower threshold tripping time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterDcInjectionProtectionThreshold
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Power quality requirement accoding EN50438. Limitation of the reaction from the inverter to the distribution network. DC injection protection upper threshold

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterDcInjectionProtectionThreshTrippingTime
MetaDataPointI16.Description: DC injection protection threshold tripping time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterGridMonitorTimeStartUp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Grid condition observation time before conection at start up

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterGridMonitorTimeReconnectAfterGridFailure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Grid condition observation time before reconnection after grid failure

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterGridMonTimeReconnectAfterShortTimeInterrupt
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Grid condition observation time before reconnection after short time interruptions

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterMaximumDurationShortTimeInterruption
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum duration of a short time interruption as specified by the distribution network operator

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterMaximumFrequencyDeviation
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Method of anti-islanding protection. Maximum frequency deviation (ROCOF)

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterMaximumFrequencyDeviationTrippingTime
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum frequency deviation tripping time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterStartFrequencyThresholdPnDerating
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Start frequency threshold for active power reduction at overfrequency. Parameter is the delta value to the nominal frequency: fN + x. If the frequency exceeds this threshold, the power output is decreased with the gradient set in parameter 2871 when the frequency is increasing and increased when the frequency decreasing.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterGradientPowerRampActivePnDerating
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Gradient of the power output reduction at overfrequency. The gradient is calculated with the percentage of the actual power output (this parameter) at that time when the frequency exceeds the theshold of parameter 2870 per Hz.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterMaxGradientAfterReconnectGridProtectDevice
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum gradient for power output increase at reconnection after tripping of grid interface protection device (percentage of nominal power output per minute)

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterStartAdjustableRangePnDerating
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Adjustable power output range for active power reduction at overfrequency for limited controlable generators. Lower power output level as percentage of nominal power output.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterUpFrequencyThreshReconnectAfterGridFailure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Upper frequency threshold for connection to the grid during the grid condition observation time. Parameter is the delta value to the nominal frequency: fN + x.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterLowFrequencyThreshReconnectAfterGridFailure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Lower frequency threshold for connection to the grid during the grid condition observation time. Parameter is the delta value to the nominal frequency: fN - x.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterUpVoltageThreshReconnectAfterGridFailure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Upper voltage threshold for connection to the grid during the grid condition observation time.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parInverterLowVoltageThreshReconnectAfterGridFailure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Requirement for the connection to the distribution network. Lower voltage threshold for connection to the grid during the grid condition observation time.
