MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorEvapTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter to configure the maximum allowed temperature for the heat conducting medium in order to provide a pump protection feature, possible values are within the range 60 200 C.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarFunction
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter to configure the mode of the advanced solar DHW and/or CH function group, possible values are Solar DHW Solar CH or Solar DHW + CH .

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarCollectorSensorType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the solar collector type, possible values are either or .

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorEvapOffset
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter to configure the offset of the solar collector evaporation temperature offset, possible values are within the range 5 40K, default value is 5K.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parSolarAntifreezeCollector
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Parameter for setting the minimum allowed temperature in the solar panel in order to avoid freeze occurrence in the heat conducting medium. The value is depended on the antifreeze concentration. -31 C disables the antifreeze protection

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarAntifreezeHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter to configure the hysteresis of the solar collector anti-freeze temperature offset, possible values are within the range 5 40K, default value is 5K.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarAntifreezeConcentration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the percentage of the antifreeze (propylene glycol for instance) in the heat conducting medium. Possible values are within the range 0% ~ 60%.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorMaxTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the maximum allowed temperature in the solar panel for overheat protection. Possible values are within the range 60 C ~ 200 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDhwTankNominalTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the nominal setpoint to charge the DHW tank with solar energy, possible values are within the range 8 C ~ 60 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDhwTankMaxTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the maximum setpoint to charge the DHW tank with solar energy. Possible values are within the range 8 C ~ 90 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDhwTankLimitTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the limit temperature that is allowed for the DHW tank. Possible values are within the range 40 C ~ 95 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarChTankNominalTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the nominal setpoint to charge the CH tank with solar energy, possible values are within the range 8 C ~ 60 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarChTankMaxTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the maximum setpoint to charge the CH tank with solar energy. Possible values are within the range 8 C ~ 90 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarChTankLimitTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the limit temperature that is allowed for the CH tank. Possible values are within the range 40 C ~ 95 C.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarTankPriority
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the tank priority for storing the solar energy depending on the predefined nominal, maximum and limit respective temperature setpoints. Possible values are DHW Tank or CH Buffer Tank .

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for the configuration of using the solar collector in recooling mode of the DHW and CH tanks, with possible mode values: OFF Mode Ever Mode Summer Mode and Temperature Mode .

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingMaxTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the maximal allowed temperature of the solar collector that allows the solar collector to be used in cooling mode of both DHW and CH tanks. Possible values are within the range 8 C ~ 90 C.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingStartTimer
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the time delay during which the solar collector temperature shall be below its maximal allowed value (parSolarCollectorReccolingMaxTemp) for the cooling function mode to be allowed. Possible values are within the range 0min ~ 60min.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingDurationTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the cooling duration of both DHW and CH tanks using the solar collector with possible values within the range 0min ~ 240min.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingTempDhw
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the DHW-Tank target temperature of the solar collector cooling mode, with possible target value within the range 8 C ~ 90 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingTempCh
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the CH-Tank target temperature of the solar collector cooling mode, with possible target value within the range 8 C ~ 90 C.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingTankPriority
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the tanks priorities (i.e. which tank has to be cooled first) for the solar panel cooling mode, with possible values DHW-Tank and CH-Tank .

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarMinChargTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the minimum temperature that allows using the solar collector for charging the solar energy in the either DHW or CH tanks. Possible values are within the range 8 C ~ 90 C.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarStartTubeCollectorMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the mode of the solar tube collector function, with possible configurable modes: OFF Mode Time Mode and ON Mode .

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStartTubeCollectorOn
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the starting time of the solar tube collector function with possible values within the range 00:00 23:50. The time will be indicated in 10 minutes since the start of the day. This means value 10 will be at 1:40 am.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStartTubeCollectorOff
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the stopping time of the solar tube collector function with possible values within the range 00:00 23:50. The time will be indicated in 10 minutes since the start of the day. This means value 10 will be at 1:40 am.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStartTubeCollectorInterval
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the time interval that defines the maximal delay before forcing the solar collector pump to ON if the active tank temperature didn t reach its maximum allowed value (valid only for tube collector function). Possible values are within the range 1min ~ 60min.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarStartTubeCollectorGradient
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting maximal allowed gradient for the solar collector temperature rising in [ C/min]. Possible values for the gradient are within the range 0 C/min ~ 20 C/min.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarSetpointOffset
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the temperature offset value between the solar collector temperature and the either DHW or CH tank temperature setpoint before switching the solar pump to ON, with possible values in the range 1 C ~ 40 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarSetpointHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the temperature hysteresis value between the solar collector temperature and the either DHW or CH tank temperature setpoint before switching the solar pump to OFF, with possible values in the range 1 C ~ 40 C.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarPumpInterface
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the interface of the solar pump used in the installation, with possible configuration values or .

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolar230VOutput
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the functioning mode of the solar collector pump, with possible configuration values Switched Mode or Always ON Mode .

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarPumpsNumber
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the number of solar pumps that will handled by the function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarPanelsNumber
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the number of solar panels (or solar panel temperature sensors) that will handled by the function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarPumpsPerPanelNumber
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the number of solar pumps per solar panel that will handled by the function group.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolar3WvPresent
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the presence of a three-way valve. Possible values are or .

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpMinSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the solar pump minimal speed (LIN or PWM) in percent for deltaT speed control.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpMaxSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the solar pump maximal speed (LIN or PWM) in percent for deltaT speed control.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpRiseStep
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the minimal temperature rising in C corresponding to an increase in rotation speed for the deltaT speed control with an amount configurable with the parameter parSolarPumpSpeedStep.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpFallStep
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the minimal temperature falling in C corresponding to a decrease in rotation speed for the deltaT speed control with an amount configurable with the parameter parSolarPumpSpeedStep.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpSpeedStep
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the solar pump speed variation step in % (increase or decrease), that is used for the deltaT speed control.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStorageTanksNumber
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the number of thermal energy storage tanks that will handled by the function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStorageTankSensorOne
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the first sensor of each heat storage tank handled by the solar function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStorageTankSensorTwo
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the second sensor of each heat storage tank handled by the solar function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolar3WvNumber
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the number of three-way valves that will handled by the function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolar3WvFirstHeatDestination
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the first heat destination for each three-way valve handled by the solar function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolar3WvSecondHeatDestination
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the second heat destination for each three-way valve handled by the solar function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarPumpHeatSource
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the heat source for each solar pump handled by the solar function group.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarPumpHeatDestination
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the heat destination for each solar pump handled by the solar function group.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarIsHeatBackupPresent
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for setting the presence of a heat backup for the solar tank, possible values are "Yes" or "No".

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarFgEnabled
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for enabling/disabling the solar function group, possible values are either or .

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarHeatBackupSwitchOnTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Thermostat switch-on temperature Adjustment range: 0.0 95.0 C Factory setting: 40.0 C

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarHeatBackupSwitchOffTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Thermostat switch-off temperature Adjustment range: 0.0 95.0 C Factory setting: 45.0 C

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarHeatDumpType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for configuring the heat dump type, either a radiator or a fancoil (or ventillator).

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarIsHeatExchangePresent
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for setting the presence of a heat exchange for the solar tank, possible values are "Yes" or "No".

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parSolarHeatExchangeSwitchOnTempDiff
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Parameter for setting the heat exchange switch-on temperature difference.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parSolarHeatExchangeSwitchOffTempDiff
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Parameter for setting the heat exchange switch-off temperature difference.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parSolarHeatExchangeDestinationTankLimitTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Parameter for setting the limit temperature of the solar heat exchange destination tank.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorMaxTempOffset
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter to configure the offset of the solar collector maximal temperature, possible values are within the range 5 40K, default value is 5K.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpMinimumHeatPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the solar pump minimal solar thermal power corresponding to the pump minimal rotation speed.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpMaximumHeatPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the solar pump maximal solar thermal power corresponding to the pump maximal rotation speed.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarExternalEnergyCounterConfig
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for setting the activation of the external energy counter, the possible values are either active or inactive.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarExtEnergyCounterPulseValency
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Pulse valency in Wh of external energy counter(s) DHW and CH.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarHydraulicsType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Configuration of the solar hydraulics installation type.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarAntifreezeConcentrationEnable
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for enabling or disabling the anti-freeze offset calculation with respect to anti-freeze concentration.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parPhotovoltaicType
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Type of used PV device

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarStartTubePumpOnTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the time during which the pump is in ON state when the tube collector function is active. Possible values in seconds are within the range 10s to 240s.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorRecoolingMaxTempHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the hysteresis of the collector maximal recooling temperature.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarChBufferMaxSetpointReduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Reduction of the setpoint of a buffered CH zone based on the heat delivery of a solar collector (solar first).

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolar3WVPermanentPhase
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Is the 3WV of permanent phase type

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDhwPrimaryMaxSetpointReduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Reduction of the setpoint of the primary DHW based on the heat delivery of a solar collector (solar first).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarAntifreezeBufferTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for setting the minimum allowed temperature in the DHW-Tank or the CH-Tank in order to avoid freeze occurrence in the buffers. Possible values are within the range +5 C ~ +20 C.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarPumpAntiFreezeDurationInMinutes
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for configuring the pump ON duration for the antifreeze function, possible values are within the range 1min ~ 5min.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarRecoolingNightTimeStart
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the starting time of the solar recooling function with possible values within the range 00:00 23:50. The time will be indicated in 10 minutes since the start of the day. This means value 10 will be at 1:40 am.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarRecoolingNightTimeEnd
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the ending time of the solar recooling function with possible values within the range 00:00 23:50. The time will be indicated in 10 minutes since the start of the day. This means value 10 will be at 1:40 am.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarDrainbackOptionEnable
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Parameter for enabling or disabling the drainback option in the solar installation.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDrainbackSwitchOnConditionDuration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter related to the drainback function, used for configuring the time delay during which the condition on the temperature difference between the heat source and heat destination shall be fulfilled, before switching the solar pump to ON status, with possible values in the interval 1s and 100s.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDrainbackFillingTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter related to the drainback function, used for configuring the filling duration of the solar panel, with possible values in the interval 1min and 30min.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parSolarDrainbackStabilisationTime
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter related to the drainback function, used for configuring the stabilisation duration after the filling of the solar panel, before switching OFF the solar pump, with possible values in the interval 1min and 30min.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarDrainbackEmptyingDuration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter related to the drainback function, used for configuring the emptying duration of the solar panel, with possible values in the interval 1min and 30min.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApPowerPvSurplusAlpha
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Alpha coefficient to filter Solar panels power surplus

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parApPowerPvSurplusThresholdOn
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Power threshold to start detecting a power surplus

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApPvOverConsumptionDelayOn
MetaDataPointU16.Description: time to allow activation of PV over consumption mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApPPv
MetaDataPointU8.Description: P factor of PID control based on Power Surplus

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApIPv
MetaDataPointU8.Description: I factor of PID control based on Power Surplus

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApDPv
MetaDataPointU8.Description: D factor of PID control of offset based on Power Surplus

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApPvOverConsumptionDelayOff
MetaDataPointU16.Description: time to allow deactivation of PV over consumption mode

MetaDataPointI16.Name: parApPowerPvSurplusThresholdOff
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Power threshold to stop detecting a power surplus

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarRecoolingOngoingHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the hysteresis used for checking if the recooling is ongoing, with values within the range 1 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarRecoolingOngoingDuration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the reference duration used for checking if the recooling is ongoing, with values within the range 1min and 240min, factory default values is 120min.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarTankSetpointHysteresis
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the hysteresis used for the solar tanks setpoints (nominal, maximal and limit), with values within the range 1 C.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parSolarPumpLinControlMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: If the solar pump is a LIN one (see parSolarPumpInterface), this parameter defines the control mode to be used

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarPumpsSwitchOffConditionDuration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the minimum duration of the switch off condition before switching the pump to OFF state, when drainback function is enabled, with values within the range 1s 10s.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarGradientSamplingIntervalInSeconds
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for configuring the sampling period used for the temperature gradient estimator, with possible values within the range 1s ... 3600s.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parSolarCollectorStartTubePumpOnTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Parameter for the configuration of the time during which the pump is in ON state when the tube collector function is active. Possible values in seconds are within the range 5s to 600s.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDevChD
MetaDataPointU8.Description: D part of temperature PID control on CH mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parCascadeNeutralBandStrategy
MetaDataPointU8.Description: 0: Don t remove or add any producer when in neutral band 1: Allowed to remove all producers when the flow temperature is in the neutral band 2:Allowed to remove producers, but always keep 1 producer active

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApTxPdoData
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Development / Debug: TxPDO Data. Each sub index determines the data that is transmitted on a TX PDO.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varApRxPdoData
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Development / Debug: RxPDO Data. Each sub index determines the data that is received on a RX PDO.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApTxPdoConfig
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Development / Debug: TxPDO Config. Holds the configuration of the TxPdoData in 2c02.0.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: parApRxPdoConfig
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Development / Debug: RxPDO Config. Holds the configuration of the RxPdoData in 2c03.0.

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Configuration for logging of parameters during certification. Fill in objects to be logged.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parApAutoFillingInstallationCompleted
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: This parameter indicates that the filling installation has been done, filling completed succesfull upto the operational pressure, at least once. This parameter is reset if after a power cycle the pressure is below ultimate low This parameter is also used when auto filling is disabled by the installer. It is checked on startup whether the HMI has already asked the installer if we have an auto filling accessory.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApEnergyCounterServiceFactor

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parApCalibrationDhwSystemCoolingTimeOut

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parApPumpCalibrationPreRun

MetaDataPointU16.Description: DHW temperature setpoint

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Temperature hysteresis for the generator to start on domestic hot water production

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Temperature offset to stop generator on domestic hot water production

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parDhwLoadHysteresis

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwPercentageTfTrHigh
MetaDataPointU8.Description: % of Tf for the calculated dhw combi control temperature at 7,5 L/min. 100 % minus this parameter is the Tr part

MetaDataPointU8.Description: Factor to calculate pulse / min to L / min

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Min flow rate to start and stop the combi heat demand

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parDhwFlowSensor
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Flow sensor or flow switch

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: parDhweCirculationMode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhweCirculationPumpOnDuration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the ON-time of the Circulation pump, possible values are within the range 0 20min.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhweCirculationPumpOffDuration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Parameter for setting the OFF-time duration of the Circulation pump, possible values are within the range 0 20min.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwFrequencyPulseTimeWindow

MetaDataPointU8.Description: During this time the pump stays at start speed.

MetaDataPointU16.Description: The maximum gradient allowed to enable the pump modulation for dhw. When exceeded the pump is set to start speed for parDhwStabilizationTime

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Stop the boosting power when the DHW temperature is in range of the setpoint

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwBoostPFeedForward
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Change power at DWH flow rate changes

MetaDataPointU16.Description: Offset on the Dhw setpiont for external tank sensor to end heat demand

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwCalorifierPumpPostRun

MetaDataPointU8.Description: Maximum pump speed for Dhw

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwPumpSpeedStart
MetaDataPointU8.Description: start pump speed at combi heat demand

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwCombiSoloUpP
MetaDataPointU8.Description: P factor for combi temperature control

MetaDataPointU8.Name: parDhwCombiSoloUpI

MetaDataPointU8.Description: I factor for pump modulation during combi mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: parDhweCirculationTempOffset

MetaDataPointI16.Description: Measured return temperature without heat exchanger correction

MetaDataPointI8.Name: varHeGvcFlowTemperatureCompensation
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Correction of burner curve based on flow temperature

MetaDataPointI8.Name: varHeGvcAmbientTemperatureCompensation
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Compensation of burnercurve based on ambient temperature

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeGvcKnownStepper
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Last known GasValveStepper position after succesful ingition

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeGvcGasValveDelta
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Delta of the gas valve stepper

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeCtrFailedBurnerStarts
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Number of failed starts

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcIncreasedMinimumPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: When the SCOT system reaches the minimum gas air ratio, the gas valve modulator is at its low end the gas flow is at risk (fan is running at a low speed), for 7 seconds or more the system will increase the minimum power according to this data point. The increased minimum power mode will last for 1 hour.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeGvcWarningCode
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gas Valve Control Warning code

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcIonisationBaseValue
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the ionization base value found during calibration at calibration power. This value is used to determine ionization setpoints at the power levels in the calibration table by using a % of this value. Interpolation is used for the powers in between

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeFanRpm
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual fan RPM

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeFanRpmSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual fan RPM setpoint

MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Gas valve open / closed

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeGpsSwitch
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: GPS switch open / closed

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeIgnition
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Boiler is igniting?

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeIonisationCurrent
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Actual flame current measured

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHePower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual power in % being output, related to CH or DWH

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHePowerAvailable
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Available power in % of max

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHePowerSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Power setpoint in % of max

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeReleaseInput
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Release signal for the CU (ext HD)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeShutdownInput
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Blocking input for the CU var blocking input

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcIonizationActual
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the actual ionization value in points form 0 to 255. 0 is no ionization and 255 is max ionization. It is used, together with the setpoint to control the gas valve modulator

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeVpsSwitch
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: VPS switch open / closed

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHeGvcCommand
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Command to the GVCE module

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcMassflow
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Current air mass flow measured by gvc

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcIonizationSetpoint
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the ionization setpoint value in points form 0 to 255. 0 is no ionization and 255 is max ionization. It is used, together with the actual value to control the gas valve modulator

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCtrCalibrationIgnitionCountDown
MetaDataPointU8.Description: The variable holds the amount of ignition cycles left before a calibration is mandatory. The value 255 means out of range only counts less than 255 are shown.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcConvertedGasType
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gas type sent to safety core, linked to parHeGasTypeSelector. Gas type "values" may be different for each safety core, this value act as a converter. May contain different values for each GVC.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeSafetyTemperature1
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Safety temperature 1. This can be the flow temperature, return temperature or heat ex temperature depending on the implementation of the safety unit

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeSafetyTemperature2
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Safety temperature 1. This can be the flow temperature, return temperature or heat ex temperature depending on the implementation of the safety unit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeBurnerCommand
MetaDataPointU8.Description: burner Command to GVC (combination with power demand 16917)

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeGvcBurnerTemperature1
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Gas Valve Control Burner Temperature 1

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeGvcBurnerTemperature2
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Gas Valve Control Burner Temperature 2

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeStbStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: STB status (0 open 1 closed)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcGVPosition
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Gas Valve Control Gas Valve position

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeFlameTestActive
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Flame test active=1 inactive=0

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeGvcMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of the GVC

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeGvcInput
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Change the operational mode of the GVC

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeGvcOutput
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gas Valve Control Output

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeGvcState
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Gas Valve Control State

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeGvcSubState
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Gas Valve Control Sub State

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeGvcLockingCode
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gas Valve Control Locking Code

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeGvcBlockingCode
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Gas Valve Control Blocking code

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcPowerOutput
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Current ouptuput from the GVC to the CU (or fan for pnuematic systems RPM related)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcPowerSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Power setpoint from CU to GVC (or fan for pneumatic devices RPM related)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcGVPositionSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Position setpoint for the gas valve actuator

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcBurnerTemperatureSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint for the burner temperature

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeGvcMassflowTarget
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Target mass flow for the gvce control

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHeFanPwm
MetaDataPointU8.Description: current PWM signal to fan or PWM feedback from GVC if PWM in communication (GVC-E)

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varApDebug
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Datapoint used for debugging

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeTFlow2
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Secondary flow temperature sensor. Used for sanity checks of the primary flow sensor.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHeSafetyTemperature3
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Safety Temperature 3 (TS3); the 3rd safety temperature for protecting the heat exchanger.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeControlledStopReason
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Possible reason for Controlled Stop

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varGvcCalibrationTypeSupported
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Which type of calibration, for the combustion is supported by the GVC, it is to determine which interface for the user must be displayed. When not present or zero there is no calibration. Service tool command calibration is only accepted when not equal to 0

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcGasValveModulatorOffset
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This is the offset to allow gas flow. The modulator must open to this value before enough gas can flow for stable minimum load burning. Over time this value can change due to wear. This value is check automatically during low load operation.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcGasValveModulatorPower
MetaDataPointU8.Description: PWM value of the gas valve modulator

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeCtrMinFlameCurrent
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Number of pneumatic combustion warnings

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffEntries
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient limits for all power levels

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffMaxCapacityLowerLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient maximum power lower limit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffMaxCapacityUpperLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient maximum power upper limit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffMedCapacityLowerLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient medium power lower limit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffMedCapacityUpperLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient medium power upper limit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffMinCapacityLowerLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient minimum power lower limit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcCombCoeffMinCapacityUpperLimit
MetaDataPointU8.Description: GVC combustion coefficient minimum power upper limit

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcProgrammingParameterProgress
MetaDataPointU8.Description: In this data point the progress of writing the parameters in the GVC can be tracked. After blocktransfer the set of data needs to be unpacked, checked and written to the data memory of the safety core. The data point will run from 0 to 99.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcCtrCalibrations
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Amount of automatic calibrations performed since last service interval

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varGvcCalibrationAllowed
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: This parameter is used to allow or deny calibration. Can be No by default (request based) or Yes by default (handbrake based), see decomposition GFB.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeAbsMinRPM
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Absolute minimum RPM possible. The value of this signal equals fan RPM @ 0% power. This value is calculated based on the minimum values of all fan RPMs and its intention is to align the modulation range in power to RPM.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeAbsMaxRPM
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Absolute maximum RPM possible. The value of this signal equals fan RPM @ 100% power. This value is calculated based on the maximum values of all fan RPMs and its intention is to align the modulation range from power to RPM.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcHeatDemandCategory
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Category of the active head demand, required by Sitherm Pro

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeIonisationCurrentU16
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual flame current measured for devices with a maximum higher than 25 uA.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varGvcPositionStepper
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Position of the stepper motor of the gas valve

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcAdaInterval
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Automatic Drift Adaption (ADA) interval of the Sitherm Pro calibration points (1-7). The interval indicates that calibration is pending.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcAdaResult
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Automatic Drift Adaption (ADA) results for the Sitherm Pro calibration points (1-7). The result shows the result of the last drift test for a calibration point.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcAdaFilterValue
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Automatic Drift Adaption (ADA) filter value of the Sitherm Pro calibration points (1-7). The filter values indicates the calibration result after filtering.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varGvcAdaCorrection
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Automatic Drift Adaption (ADA) correction of the Sitherm Pro calibration points (1-7). The correction value shows difference between the calculated calibration value and the default control value.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcAdaTimeUntilExpiration
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Automatic Drift Adaption (ADA) time until expiration of the Sitherm Pro calibration points (1-7). The time until expiration shows the amount of time that is left until ADA interval 1 expires, resulting in a pending calibration.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varGvcLearningValueGasQuality
MetaDataPointI16.Description: The current learning value for control of the stepper motor at the time of ignition. Value 0 stands for an invalid learning value.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcSithermProOperatingPhase
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Operating phase for the Sitherm Pro system

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varGvcControlValue
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control value calculated by the Sitherm Pro controller. The new stepper motor position is calculated based on this control value.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcSithermProState
MetaDataPointU16.Description: State for the Sitherm Pro system

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcAdaElapsedTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Automatic Drift Adaption (ADA) elapsed time of the Sitherm Pro calibration points (1-7). The elapsed time shows the counter used by Sitherm Pro and is used to determine the time ADA intervals.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varApPumpOverride
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Setpoint used for overriding dT modulation of pump control

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHeRequestedPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heater Requested Power

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeHeatupStandaloneMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Heatup standalone mode active

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcAdaIntervalInput
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Input datapoint to receive GVC data for conversion to varGvcAdaInterval

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: varGvcSafetyConfigurationVersion
MetaDataPointStruct.Description: Version number of the safety configuration collection

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcGasFlowSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of the Gas mass flow expressed in pressure (flow is actually measured by a differential pressure sensor)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcGasFlow
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual value of the Gas mass flow expressed in pressure (flow is actually measured by a differential pressure sensor)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcAirFlowSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of the Air mass flow expressed in pressure (flow is actually measured by a differential pressure sensor)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcAirFlow
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual value of the Air mass flow expressed in pressure (flow is actually measured by a differential pressure sensor)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcBurnerTemperature1
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Temperature read by the first thermocouple placed on the burner. Thermocouple 1 and 2 are placed aprox in the same spot for redundancy (safety reason).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcBurnerTemperature2
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Temperature read by the second thermocouple placed on the burner. Thermocouple 1 and 2 are placed aprox in the same spot for redundancy (safety reason).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcLeakageSensor1
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Value read by the first (and mandatory) H2 leakage sensor

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcLeakageSensor2
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Value read by the second (and optional) H2 leakage sensor

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcUvSensor
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Signal proportional to the UltraViolet light present in the combustion chamber. UV sensor is used to check if the flame is on/off.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcModulatorCurrent
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Signal proportional to the opening of the gas valve

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varGvcO2Value
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Measured O2 value from the OM501 O2 sensor controller (Resideo)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varGvcPositionStepperSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Setpoint of the stepper motor of the gas valve

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvCO2SensorInfo
MetaDataPointU8.Description: OM501 (Resideo) O2 sensor Info bits bit 0: REQ_AIR_CAL 1: REQ_FLUE_CAL

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varGvcO2PowerUsage
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Current O2 sensor power usage

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHeStb2Status
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: STB 2 status (0 open 1 closed)

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varGvcStepperMotorCounter
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Signal for total number of steps of the stepper motor. Read from the stepper motor counter stored in the gvc

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpPumpDutyCycleFeedback
MetaDataPointU16.Description: dutyCycle of pump feedback

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpHeatPumpTF
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump flow temperature after condenser

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpHeatPumpTR
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump return temperature after condenser.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpHeatPumpSetpoint
MetaDataPointI16.Description: System flow temperature setpoint including backups

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpBlockingInput1
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Heat Pump BlockingInput1

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpBlockingInput2
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Heat Pump BlockingInput2

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpHumiditySensor
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Relative humidity measured by the humidity sensor

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpUnitFailure
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Heat Pump Error State

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorState
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indication if the compressor is operating or not,

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpDefrost
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Heat Pump Defrost

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHp5VFeedback
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat Pump 5V feedback

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpSourcePump
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indication if the source pump is ON or OFF

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpBackUp1State
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indication if the first stage of backup is ON or OFF

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpBackUp2State
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indication if the second stage of backup is ON or OFF

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpHeatCool4wv
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indication if the 4 way valve of the thermodynamic circuit is in heating or cooling position

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpFreeCooling3wv
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of the diverting free cooling valve

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpElecEnergyMeter
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Electric energy meter

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorLock
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Release or locking status of the compressor

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitDipSwitchConfiguration
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: This variable contains the current DIP switch configuration of the interface electronic board located in the indoor unit

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitCondensingTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: This variable contains the condensing temperature of the refrigerent

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpHeatPumpFlowTempAveraged
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat Pump Flow Temp Averaged

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpSourceTOut
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump source temperature going out of the evaporator

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpSourcePumpSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Speed of the source pump (%)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitErrorRate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This variable relates the quality of the communication between the controller electronic board and the interface electronic board

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpHighPressureSwitch
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of the high pressure switch of the thermodynamic circuit

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpLowPressureSwitch
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of the low pressure switch of the thermodynamic circuit

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpFlowSwitch
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of the flow switch of the source circuit

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompErrorSoftStarter
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Compressor and Soft Starter global error status

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompMaxTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum flow temperature depending on the operating point of the compressor

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompDemand
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status if the compressor is in starting request or not.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCOPCalculated
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Instantaneous COP calculated by Hybrid application

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCOPThreshold
MetaDataPointU16.Description: COP threshold calculated by Hybrid

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCoolingSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Flow temperature setpoint in cooling mode

MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu flow temperature

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpBackupPcuReturnTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu return temperature

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpBackupPcuDhwTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu dhw temperature

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpBackupPcuInternalSetpoint
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu internal temperature setpoint

MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu status

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpBackupPcuSubStatus

MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu Locking

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpBackupPcuBLocking
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu Blocking
