MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu parameter table

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varHpBackupPcuCounters
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu counter table

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHp5VOutput
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump 5V signal output setpoint

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpBackupPcuServiceNotification
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump PCU back up Service Notification

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpBackupPcuIonizationCurrent
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu ionization current

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpBackupPcuFanSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu fan speed

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpBackupPcuConfiguration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu configuration

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpBackupPcuPressure
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump boiler backup pcu pressure

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpBackupDemand
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status if the backups are in starting request or not

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpBackupFlowTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Flow temperature after backups

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpRefrigerantPressure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Refrigerant Pressure

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpTimeBetweenStage
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat Pump temporisation timer before activating next generator stage

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpTempoBetweenStageCalculated
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Heat pump calculated temporisation before activating next back up stage

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpNbStageAvailable
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump number of generator stage available

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpNbStageRequired
MetaDataPointU8.Description: heat pump number of generator stages required

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCompressorCurrent
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The actual current of the ODU as measured by the ODU, is used in the ODU unit to protect against too high current.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpPumpSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Current speed of the condenser pump

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpPumpRunning
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indication if the condenser pump is ON or OFF

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpPumpRunHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter of the operating hours of the condenser pump (also called Hp Pump)

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpPumpStarts
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Total amount of condenser pump starts. (also called Hp Pump)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitOperatingMode
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Operation mode of the outdoor unit. In the current control scheme only the HEAT (1) and COOL (2) modes are used. The current default is HEAT (1).

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitModulationLevel
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Control the modulation level of the outdoor unit. The different modulation levels are mapped to values between 64-254 for heating, and between 64-224 in cooling mode. The values correspond to compressor speeds, the relation between this value and the compressor speed is described in: XXX

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitErrorCode
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Alarm codes when there is an alarm condition

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpIndoorUnitHeatExchangerTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature measured by the NTC placed on the heat exchanger of the indoor unit on the liquid line

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitHeatExchangerTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature of the evaporator of the ODU. This sensor is mounted on the outdoor heat exchanger. This sensor value is used by the internal Toshiba controls for determining when to defrost and for controlling the electronic expansion valve. This controls cannot be influenced by the IDU.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompressorSuctionTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature measured on the refrigerant line on the compressor suction line. This value is used in the internal controls of the ODU and is important in controlling the electronic expansion valve. The IDU doesn't use this value for controls.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompressorDischargeTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature measured on the refrigerant line of the compressor discharge line. This value is used for safety features of the ODU, the IDU doesn't actively use this value for controls.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitCoilTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature measure on the liquid refrigerant line

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitlimitPressureExceeded
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Current value of the pressure switch in the ODU, when active the maximum pressure has been exceeded

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpCompressorFrequency
MetaDataPointU8.Description: The current actual compressor speed measured in Hz. The actual minimum and maximum values are different depending on the ODU.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdootUnitFanSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Current speed of the fan of the ODU, this value varies based on the ODU and the outdoor conditions

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitElectronicValvePosition
MetaDataPointU16.Description: This register depicts the position of the Pulse Motor Valve (PMV) of the electronic expansion valve. The EEV is controlled independantly by the ODU.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitProtectFunction
MetaDataPointU8.Description: This register shows the active protect functions, if active these protect functions may prevent the ODU running at the requested speed. When protect functions are active for too long the ODU may be switched off. Current protection: Active when current draw is too high, the maximum depends on the type of ODU. TD protection: Active when the discharge temperature is too high, the maximum depends on the type of ODU. TC protection: Active when the condenser temperature is too high, the maximum depends on the type of ODU.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCtrCompressorRunHours
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Counter for the amount of compressor operation time in hours. This value cannot be reset.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCtrToshibaIndoorPcbRunHours
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Counter for the amount of Toshiba indoor PCB power-on time

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitReturnTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature sensor mounted on the return flow of the heat pump

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpToshibaModbusInterfaceSoftware
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Software version of the ModBus kit

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpInterfaceTflow
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Flow temperature sensor connected to the interface board of the heat pump

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpInterfaceTreturn
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Return temperature sensor connected to the interface board of the heat pump

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOduRelayStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Dry contact signal to enable or disable the compressor. Open = Locked; Close = unlocked

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpEvaporationTempCorrected
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Evaporation temperature corrected

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpAmbientAirTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Ambient air temperature

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpBackupSetPoint
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Temperature set point of the backup

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompressorTempLimitation
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Maximum admissible condensation temperature of compressor

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpDigitalInput1State
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: State of the digital input: 0 - inactive : the contact state is not equal to the parameter logic level, the digital input function is not active 1 - active : ... equal ... , the digital input function could be active in regard to its mode parameter

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpDigitalInput2State
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: State of the digital input: 0 - inactive : the contact state is not equal to the parameter logic level, the digital input function is not active 1 - active : ... equal ... , the digital input function could be active in regard to its mode parameter

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpDefrostValveState
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Defrost valve state

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpFanSpeed
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Fan speed 0 : off 1 : half speed 2 : full speed

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorPermissive
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The compressor is on the right conditions to run

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorBalancePressure
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Is the Compressor in start / stop phase of balancing pressure

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorWarmUp
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Is the compressor in warmup step

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorStartPermission
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Is the compressor allowed to run

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorStopPermission
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Is the compressor allowed to stop

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpDefrostingHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter defrosting hours

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpDefrostingCycles
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter defrosting cycles

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpTimeBeforeStartBackup
MetaDataPointU16.Description: computed time before starting backups

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpActualTimeBeforeStartBackup
MetaDataPointU16.Description: actual time before starting backups

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpDefrostHeatTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: time normal heat in defrost preventive mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpDefrostDeiceTime
MetaDataPointU16.Description: time defrost heat in defrost preventive mode

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpDefrostCorrectionFactor
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Factor computed for defrost preventive mode

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpDefrostThreshold
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Computed threshold for defrost curative mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpDiagTimeCompressorOn
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Duration of compressor On for diagnostic

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpAmbientTRefresh
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Ambient temperature refresh is in progress

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCondenserRefrigerantGasTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Refrigerant gas temperature sensor located at the inlet pipe of the condenser

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitPumpDown
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Pump down has been manually actived on the outdoor unit

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitOutsideTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Outdoor air temperature sensor located at the evaporator of the outdoor unit

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCondenserRefrigerantPressure
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Refrigerant pressure sensor located at the compressor

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitVoltage
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Power supply voltage of the outdoor unit

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpElectricalEnergy
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Electrical energy consumed by the thermodynamic module. The energy is measured by the inverter module. (can be inside for GSHP or outside for ASHP)

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpManualDefrost
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: variable indicating if the heat pump is in manual defrost mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpType
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Heat pump type (BDR, M-Thermal-split, Monobloc, Package)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpModel
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Indicates the capacity model of compressor connected to the control unit. (can be inside for GSHP or outside for ASHP)

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varOduStatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Indicates what the heat pump is currently doing (defrost, oil recovering )

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitSoftwareVersion
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Software version of the odu connected to the modbus

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpIpmTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Indicates the temperature of the inverter module which drives the compressor

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOffPeriod
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indicates that the compressor in in a off periode between a stop and the next start

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpAmbientAirTemperatureAverage
MetaDataPointI16.Description: ambient air temperature average

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpDefrostModeTransition
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: defrost Mode Transition Ready

MetaDataPointVisibleString.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitErrorCodeDisplay
MetaDataPointVisibleString.Description: Alarm codes when there is an alarm condition, converted to ascii readable codes

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpInterfaceFlowmeter
MetaDataPointU16.Description: flow rate measure coming from ODU

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompressorSuctionSuperHeat
MetaDataPointI16.Description: computed suction super heat

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompressorDischargeSuperHeat
MetaDataPointI16.Description: discharge super heat

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpInterfaceHighPressure
MetaDataPointU16.Description: High pressure sensor on the ODU

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpInterfaceLowPressure
MetaDataPointU16.Description: low pressure sensor on Outdoor Unit

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitModulationLevelAccurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Control the modulation level of the outdoor unit. The values correspond to compressor setpoint.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitRelativeFanSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: ODU fan speed in %

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitRelativeElectronicValvePosition
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Position of the electronic expansion valve in %

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpSourceWaterFlow
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Source Water Flow rate

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpSourceInstantCapacity
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Calculated instantaneous capacity of the Source

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpFanSpeedPwm
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Value of the Fan Speed in percentage

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitEvaporatingTemperature
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Evaporating temperature

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpModelAccurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Capacity of the ODU connected to modbus

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpSourceCalculatedCapacity
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Source Thermal capacity calculated by EHC and sent to carel for GSHP

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCompressorFrequencyAccurate
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Accurate Compressor Frequency in Rps for Carel & GSHP

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpModelSlaveAccurate
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Nominal capacity of the slave outdoor unit (specific for Hitecsa)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCarelErrorRegisterIndex
MetaDataPointU16.Description: List of simultaneous errors actively present on the Carel outdoor unit. The values stored will be the modbus index of the discrete error registers.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitSuperheatSetpoint
MetaDataPointI16.Description: setpoint of superheat that the regulation try to reach

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitStatusExpansionValve
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Status of the expansion valve

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitOperatingCompressorMap
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Zone of the compressor map where the compressor is working

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitDefrostStatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Defrost status

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitCapacityRequestArbitration
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Capacity request applied to compressor after arbitration

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitWaterPumpRequest
MetaDataPointU16.Description: ODU water pump duty cycle request

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitSrcWaterPumpRequest
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Source water pump duty cycle request

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitWaterPumpRegulationMode
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Pump Regulation mode

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitSubstatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: ODU subStatus

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnit4WayValveStatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Way Valve Status

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitPeakToPeakSuperheat
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Oscillation peak to peak of superheat suction computed by the adaptative superheat algorithm.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitFrequencyLimitingValue
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Maximum frequency limited either by the low noise strategy/LVD or Max power / Source power limitation / Current limitation.

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitCrankcaseStatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Crankcase Status

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitSrcWaterPumpRegulationMode
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Pump Regulation mode

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitMasterType
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Carel Commercial (Hitecsa) master (in cascade configuration) outdoor unit types based on the refrigerant and nominal power value

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitSlaveType
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Carel Commercial (Hitecsa) slave (in cascade configuration) outdoor unit types based on the refrigerant and nominal power value

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitCarelActiveErrorCode
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Active error code raised by the Carel outdoor unit(s). This datapoint will have a value which corresponds to the decimal copy of the value read from the ODU modbus register which gives the ODU error code. Error code will be displayed as a combination of category code and the active error code specific to the ODU.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varEmBmsHpTemperatureSetpoint
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Temperature setpoint by bms

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpFanStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indicates the status of the fan of the heat pump

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpPlateHeatExchangerHeaterStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indicates the status of the emergency heater of the plate heat exchanger. The heater is used for frost protection

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpMinOffTimeRemaining
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The currently remaining minimum switch off time of the compressor of the heat pump

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpMinOnTimeRemaining
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The currently remaining minimum switch on time of the compressor of the heat pump

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpCompressorLimited
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Indicates if the operational range of the heat pump compressor is currently limited

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpCrankcaseHeaterTimeRemaining
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The currently remaining time of the crankcase heater, until the heat pump can start again

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpCtrInterfaceCompressorRunHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter for the amount of compressor operation time.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpCtrPlateHeatExchangerHeaterRunHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter for the amount of operation time of the plate heat exchanger heater.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpCtrFanRunHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter for the amount of operation time of the heat pump fan

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpCtrCompressorStarts
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter for the amount of starts of the heat pump compressor

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpCtrPlateHeatExchangerHeaterStarts
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter for the amount of starts of the plate heat exchanger heater.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpCtrFanStarts
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter for the amount of starts of the heat pump fan.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpActualProducedPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Currently generated thermal power from the heat pump

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpActualConsumedPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Currently consumed electrical power from the public grid.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitCarelErrorRegisterErrorCode
MetaDataPointU16.Description: List of simultaneous outdoor unit error codes actively present on the Carel outdoor unit.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpActualTemperatureSetpoint
MetaDataPointI16.Description: The currently used temperature setpoint from the ODU, which could differ from the received setpoint, because of active power limitations ect.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpMaxPowerConsumption
MetaDataPointU16.Description: The maximum electrical power the heat pump is allowed to draw from the electrical supply grid. This datapoint could be used to limit the power draw for PV surplus or any other power limitations due to grid regulations.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitErrorType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Severity of outdoor unit error detected. The ODU can raise the same error code with different severity. Eg: An issue can start as a warning and then change to a blocking after a certain period of time

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOutdoorUnitBackupForbidden
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The signal raised by outdoor unit upon detection of safety alarms to fobid starting backups when the compressor stops.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varHpMaxOutdoorUnitModulation
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Max Capacity%setting of the heatPump

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpFlagsNumberOfEntries
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Number of entries of the heat pump status flag structures

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpRequestFlags
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Request conditions for the heat pump to run

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpReleaseFlags1
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Release conditions for the heat pump to run 1

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpReleaseFlags2
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Release conditions for the heat pump to run 2

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varHpBivalentFlags
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Conditions for the heat pump to run in bivalent mode

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpOduMapMitigationState
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: status of outdoor unit map mitigation

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varHpGraphLastSwitchOffReason
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: The reason why the heat pump has switched off the last time.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varEmBmsHpExternalLockingActive
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: External release signal to lock the heat pump appliance

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpElectricPowerConsumption
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Heat Pump Estimated Electrical Power Consumption

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpDefrostDurationMinutes
MetaDataPointU32.Description: ODU Defrost state cumulated Duration in Minutes

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varHpDefrostOccurence
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Number of times the appliance has been in defrost state

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varHpCOP
MetaDataPointI16.Description: The COP value as received from the heat pump

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varChpElectricityProducerStarts
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Electricity producer starts

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varChpElectricityProducerHours
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Electricity Producer Hours

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varChpEletricityProduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Current Electricity Production

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varChpCumulativeEletricityProduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Cumulative Electricity Production

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varChpElectricityProductionActive
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Indicates that electricity is being produced when 1

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varFcCtrFpsOperatingHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Counter, total hours of the fuel processing system in operation.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcCtrStarts
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Counter, number of successful starts of the fuel cell system. Counts a complete start when the system reaches the power generation state.

MetaDataPointI32.Name: varFcCtrPwrdHours
MetaDataPointI32.Description: Counter, total hours of fuel cell system energized.

MetaDataPointI32.Name: varFcCtrOpHours
MetaDataPointI32.Description: Counter, total hours of fuel cell system operation time

MetaDataPointI32.Name: varFcMntHours
MetaDataPointI32.Description: Counter, total hours of fuel cell system energized since last maintenance.

MetaDataPointI32.Name: varFcCtrElEnergyRcv
MetaDataPointI32.Description: Cumulative electrical energy consumption of the fuel cell system.

MetaDataPointI32.Name: varFcCtrElEnergyGen
MetaDataPointI32.Description: Cumulative produced electrical energy of the fuel cell system.

MetaDataPointI32.Name: varFcCtrFuelRcv
MetaDataPointI32.Description: Cumulative natural gas consumption.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcElPowerActive
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value electrical active power output feed into the grid in percent of nominal power output.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcElPowerReactive
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value reactive power feed in or received from the grid in Volt-Ampere-Reactive (VAR)

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcElPowerFactor
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value power factor (cos phi), negative = leading (kap.) = over-excited, positive = lagging (ind.) = under-excited

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varFcElPowerActiveSP
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Actual value electrical active power output setpoint from consumer manager in percent of nominal power output.

MetaDataPointI8.Name: varFcOpStart
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Start stop command from producer manager to start or stop the fuel cell operation.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varFcPpcState
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of Power Plant Controller (PPC) state machine

MetaDataPointI8.Name: varFcPcsState
MetaDataPointI8.Description: Status of Power Conditioning System (PCS) state machine

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcScsState
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Status of Safety Control System (SCS) state machine

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varFcStatusByte
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Status Byte discribing the Status of Burner, Inverter, fuel cell availability and Error. Bit description: Bit 0: fuel cell available, ready to start; Bit 1: fuel cell in operation, grid connected; Bit 2: fuel cell in operation, idle; Bit 3; grid status, failure/ok; Bit 4: burner status, flame on/off; Bit 5: System error, lock out

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varFcGasType
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Configurated gas type, H-gas = 0/L-gas = 1. Used for different gas/ air pre settings.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varFcTimeToStart
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Estimated time before able to start after shut down.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcRampUpSpeed
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Load change speed upwards in Watt per second.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varFcRampDownSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Load change speed downwards in Watt per second.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcAirBlowerSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the fuel cell cathode and prox air blower in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFuelCompressorSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the raw fuel (natural gas) blower in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcCathodeAirBlowerSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the fuel cell cathode air blower in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcProxAirBlowerSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the preferential oxidation (PROX) air blower in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcBurnerAirBlowerSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the burner air blower in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcCoolantPumpSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the internal stack coolant ciculation pump in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcProcessWaterPumpRpm
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Rotation speed feed back of the reformer process water pump in rpm.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcProcessWaterPumpSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the reformer process water pump in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcPumpSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the fuel cell system heat recovery line pump in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcWtsPumpSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the water treatment system (WTS) circulation pump in percent. The WTS keeps the closed internal water cirquit used for fuel cell cooling and fuel processing at the required quality.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcVentingFanRpm
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value rotation speed feed back of the ventilation fan in rpm.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcVentingFanSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Control setpoint for the ventilation fan in percent.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFluePressure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual pressure value in the flue duct of the fuel cell appliance.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTempfact
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Gas adaption factor. Compensates temporary variations of the energy content of the gas.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTempfactB
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Supervisory gas adaption control factor from safety controller to monitor the plausibility of the functional gas adaption.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFuelFlowSp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Flow setpoint for the raw fuel (natural gas) requested for the current load setpoint..

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFuelFlow
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Raw fuel flow actual value (natural gas).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFuelFlowB
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Raw fuel flow actual value (natural gas). Redundant measurement from safety controller.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcCathodeAirFlow
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Fuel cell cathode air flow meter actual value.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcBurnerAirFlow
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Fuel processing system burner air flow meter actual value.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcProxAirFlow
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Preferential oxidation (PROX) air flow meter actual value.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcScRatio
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value steam to carbon ratio of the reforming process.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFlueGasOxygenSensorA
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the residual oxygen content in the flue gas, used for combustion quality supervision.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFlueGasOxygenSensorB
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the residual oxygen content in the flue gas, redundant signal for fail safe operation.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcGasPressure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the gas inlet pressure of the fuel cell system.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcProcessGasPressure
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the process gas pressure at the inlet of the fuel processing system.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTDsu
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the integrated desulfizer, associated with the electrical heater control.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTReformer
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of reformer, representing the burner temperatur.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTReformerB
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of reformer, redundant measurement from safety controller.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTFuelPreHeat
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of mixed gas pre heater. The gas is mixed with the process water (steam) and heated before entering the reformer. Associated with the electrical heater control.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTReformerOut
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of reformer catalyst at the outlet of the reformer.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTShift
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the low temperature shift converter (Shift) first step. Associated with the electrical heater control.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTShiftB
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the low temperature shift converter (Shift) second step. Associated with the electrical heater control.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTProx
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the preferential oxydation (PROX).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTAnodeIn
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the reformate, H2 rich gas, at the fuel cell anode inlet.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTCoolant
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the fuel cell coolant at the outlet of the fuel cell.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcWtsIn
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the water treatment system (WTS). Water temperature at the inlet of the ion-exchange cartridge. The WTS keeps the closed internal water cirquit used for fuel cell cooling and fuel processing at the required quality.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTVaporizer
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the vaporizer. The process water is vaporized inside the fuel processing system before mixed with the gas and conducted to the mixed gas pre heater..

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTFlow
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of heat recovery flow. The thermal energy produced by the fuel cell system is collected at several parts inside the system.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcIdcFuelCell
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the DC-current produced by the fuel cell stack.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcVdcFuelCell
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the DC-voltage generated by the fuel cell stack.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcIacHtr
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the current consumed by the internal electrical heater of the fuel processing system.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcVdcBop
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual voltage value of the general internal power supply 24V

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcVdcBop1
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual voltage value of the internal power supply 24V for blowers, pumps.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcVdcBop2
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual voltage value of the internal power supply 24V for fuel valves.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTReturn
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the heat recovery return flow entering the fuel cell.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFlowSpeed
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual volumetric flow value of the fuel cell heat recovery loop.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTCoolantTank
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the cooling water tank of the fuel cell.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTCoolantIn
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the fuel cell coolant at the inlet of the fuel cell.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcFlueGasCo
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual value of the CO concentration in the flue gas, used for combustion quality and reformate quality supervision.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcCoSensorSignal
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual analog signal value from exhaust gas CO sensor.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTCdTank
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Actual temperature value of the condensing water tank of the fuel cell.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varFcTempPcbS

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarCollectorSensorPresent
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the status of the solar collector sensor, with possible values Present & Functional and Not Present .

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the actual status of the advanced solar range boiler. Possible values for the solar boiler status are: Ready Frost Protection Pump Protection Panel Protection Loading DHW Loading CH or Recooling .

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarStatusDhw
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the actual status of the solar DHW-Tank regarding its actual temperature with respect to the predefined setpoint parameters. Possible configurable values are: Ready Loaded Nominal Setpoint Loaded Maximal Setpoint .

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarStatusCh
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the actual status of the solar CH-Tank regarding its actual temperature with respect to the predefined setpoint parameters. Possible configurable values are: Ready Loaded Nominal Setpoint Loaded Maximal Setpoint .

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarCollectorTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the actual measured instantaneous temperature of the heat conducting medium at the solar collector. The possible values are in the range -25 C; 200 C (NTC or PT1000).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarDhwBufferBottomTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the actual measured instantaneous temperature of the DHW tank low temperature sensor.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarChBufferBottomTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the actual measured instantaneous temperature of the CH tank low temperature sensor.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarAntifreezeTempOffset
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the solar panel antifreeze temperature offset corresponding the antifreeze concentration percentage in the heat conducting medium (using a lookup table for example). Possible values are within the range -48 C ~ 0 C.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarPumpMeanSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Signal for storing the instantaneous rotation speed of the solar pump. In case there is more than one solar panel, this signal shall contain the arithmetic mean value of the respective solar pumps rotation speeds.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarPumpStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the current status of each solar pump, possible values are "On" or "Off".

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarPumpSpeed
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Signal of the instantaneous rotation speed of each solar pump (in percent).

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varSolarPumpAntiSeizureDelay
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Signal for storing the time delay value in minutes since the last pump status change from ON to OFF.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarValveStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the instantaneous status of each three way valve (ON or OFF).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarHeatBackupTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the upper DHW tank backup heating temperature.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarHeatBackupRelay
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the backup heating relay status.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarHeatDumpActuatorStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the heat dump actuator status (either valve, or ventilator & pump).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarHeatExchangeSourceTankTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the temperature of the heat exchange source tank.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarHeatExchangeDestinationTankTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the temperature of the heat exchange destination tank.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarHeatExchangeRelay
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the backup heating exchange status.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varSolarEnergyCounterDhw
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Signal for storing the total solar thermal energy collected for DHW.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varSolarEnergyCounterCh
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Signal for storing the total solar thermal energy collected for CH.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varSolarTotalEnergyCounter
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Signal for storing the total solar thermal energy collected for DHW and CH.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarTankBeingCharged
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal to provide the actual charging tank CH or DHW.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarTankBeingChargedTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the temperature of the tank being charged.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarTankBeingChargedTargetTemp
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Signal for storing the current temperature setpoint of the tank being charged.

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarChargingPanelsTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the current temperature of the charging panels(s).

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varSolarSunActivitiesPumpSpeed
MetaDataPointU8.Description: mean solar pump speed for Sun activities

MetaDataPointU8.Name: varSolarSunActivitiesStatus
MetaDataPointU8.Description: Status of the Solar thermal system

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varSolarPumpRunHours
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Solar pump number of running hours.

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varSolarPumpStarts
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Solar pump number of starts.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarChBufferSetpointReductionArray
MetaDataPointU16.Description: array for receiving varSolarChBufferSetpointReduction

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varPhotovoltaicCurrentPower
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Current power of PV

MetaDataPointU32.Name: varPhotovoltaicEnergyProduced
MetaDataPointU32.Description: Total energy produced by solar

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarChBufferSetpointReduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Reduction of the setpoint of a buffered CH zone based on the heat delivery of a solar collector (solar first).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarDhwPrimarySetpointReduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Reduction of the setpoint of the DHW primary based on the heat delivery of a solar collector (solar first).

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarDhwBufferSetpointReduction
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Reduction of the setpoint of a buffered DHW zone based on the heat delivery of a solar collector (solar first).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarTempTopDHW
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the measured tank DHW top temperature (provided by the CU for example).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varSolarChBufferTopTemp
MetaDataPointI16.Description: Signal for storing the measured tank CH top temperature.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varSolarDhwPrimarySetpointReductionArray

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarDrainbackStatus
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Signal for storing the current drainback status of each solar pump, possible values are "OFF", "SWITCH_ON_CONDITION", "FILLING", "STABILISATION", "SWITCH_OFF_CONDITION", "NORMAL_CHARGING" or "EMPTYING".

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varSolarIsDrainbackPipesEmpty
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Status of the pipes when the drainback function is enable for each . The pipes can't be "Empty" or "Filled"

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varApRoomunitUsage
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: The RU offers a data point that can be read by the BOA with a CANIP READ request, which queries the internal ring-buffer containing all stored events. The BOA will receive the complete ring-buffer contents at once, the RU will empty the RingBuffer immediately upon receiving transport-layer acknowledgment of successful delivery (ie successfully delivered at the BOGW). Next time the BOA performs a read it only receives the items created after the last read.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: varBootDevicesInBootloaderMode

Contains an array of device type and serialnumber of devices that are in bootloader mode.
Devices that are in bootloader mode only share their device type and serialnumber, for a service tool to know which devices are in bootloader mode.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varApIOPWMInput
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Array of pwm input values. Index 1 provides the amount of pwm inputs , each index represents the pwm signal received from a pin. The configuration is as follow: UINT32 Frequency (in Hz) UINT32 DutyCycle (in 0.01%).

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varApIODigitalInput
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Array of digital input values. Index 1 provides the amount of digital inputs, each index represents the logic signal level received from a pin. Off means low and on means high.

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varApIOAnalogInput
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Array of analog input values. Index 1 provides the amount of analog inputs, each index represents the analog input received from a pin.

MetaDataPointStruct.Name: varApSimpleCascadeComponentInfo

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varApRoomVentilationActive
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: State of the external ventilator (running, stopped, error: didn t start, didn't stop, stopped during burning).

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varApRoomVentilationRequested
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: State of the burning demand in the boiler (burning demand is present or not)

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varApIOAnalogOutput
MetaDataPointU16.Description: Array of analog output values. Index 1 provides the amount of analog outputs, each index represents the analog voltage send to a pin.

MetaDataPointEnum.Name: varApIODigitalOutput
MetaDataPointEnum.Description: Array of digital output values. Index 1 provides the amount of digital outputs, each index represents the logic signal level set to a pin. Off means low and on means high.

MetaDataPointOctetString.Name: varApIOPWMOutput
MetaDataPointOctetString.Description: Array of pwm output values. Index 1 provides the amount of pwm outputs, each index represents the pwm signal send to a pin. The configuration is as follow: UINT32 Frequency (in Hz) UINT32 DutyCycle (in 0.01%).

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varApElectricalGridDeltaFrequency

Frequency fluctuation compared with the electrical grid reference value.
E.G. : DeltaFrequency = Fcurrent - Freference

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varApElectricalGridDeltaPowerReduction

MetaDataPointI16.Name: varApElectricalGridDeltaVoltage

MetaDataPointU16.Name: varApElectricalGridFrequencyReference
